name: Signature Lip Lightweight Satin Lipstick
about: What it is: A sheer lipstick with a satin finish and the benefits of a lip balmu2014without the heaviness of a traditional lipstick...Formulation Type: Lipstick..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Squalane and Sunflower Seed Oil: Lock in long-lasting moisture..- Papaya Fruit Extract: Soothes lips..- Raspberry Oil: Moisturizes and adds a soft aroma...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Signature Lip isn't a tinted lip balm or a traditional lipstick - it's a hydrating, buildable formula of sheer, satin color that feels so lightweight you'll forget you're wearing it.....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Isostearyl Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Tribehenin, C10-18 Triglycerides, Polyethylene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera [Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax], Copernicia Cerifera Cera [(Carnauba) Wax], Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Phenoxyethanol, Tropolone, Aroma (Flavor). May Contain (+/-): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use one swipe for a sheer finish.-Use three swipes for rich, saturated color.- Add Shade Slick Classics Tinted Lip Oil (sold separately) on top for a glossy finish

reviews.review_title: Cabo is the best color ever

Its very long lasting for a satin and the color is just absolutely gorgeous. It suits my pale neutral skin really well. And I love how pretty the packaging is so it looks nice sitting on my vanity

reviews.review_title: Waiting for a new badge that doesnt stink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade and the feel of it, but I returned it after purchasing so far twice, because it smelled like it was made with expired oil. I am hoping this was only a badge and eventually will be able to buy without the terrible smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the color but it smells terrible. Like a crayon but not in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im extremely fair and extremely cool toned. LAvenue is the only color in this line that works for me. I actually didnt think it would as it pulled orange on me (as most colors do) in the shop. In more natural light it appears as a deep neutral red. The formula is fantastic. Its neither drying or moisturizing and it feels like its not even there. Even though its a dark red-brown it stays put and doesnt migrate around my lips. I can wear it without liner for this reason. I highly recommend this lipstick, especially for the price. It compares favorably to more expensive brands. Very luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand, this lipstick, this color. I do not love that it expired soon after I bought it and neither Sephora nor Merit will let me exchange it for a fresh one. The shelf life is 12M! Ive only had it a few months and it is unwearable.

reviews.review_title: Love the color but doesnt last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its one of the best nude colors for lips and feel great and comfortable on lips but it doesnt last. I have to reapply it every 2-3 hours or after I drink (dont even talk about eating). Quite a disappointment on longevity after trying their matte formula lipstick because their matte formula really lasts. Another perfect nude satin finish lipstick that I love and lasts much longer is the YSL Caring Satin Lipstick in Nu Muse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite lipsticks and I own a ton! The colors are the perfect neutrals. I have a light neutral skin tone and these suit me amazingly. I own Baby and Slip. Slip is the exact brown Ive been wanting. Nothing too brown while still being a brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely not the same shade as in the pictures. Slip looks like a pretty nude color for brown girls, but I literally cannot see it on my lips. I applied it like 3 times and it doesn't show up at all. I found that really strange. I know Merit is supposed to be clean and sheer coverage, but these products are too costly to not even show up! Sadly I will have to be returning this shade. The packaging is nice, and it goes on super smooth, but I need SOME color payoff. I would only wear this if I wanted a bare bones no make-up make-up look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't believe this lovely lipstick has no color payoff. It's so sheer on my lips, it looks like chapstick, and 1990 is supposed to be a deep brown color ud83eudd74. I would not advise people with Deep or Dark skin tones (melanated) to buy this shade or even lipstick, especially if your lips are on the darker side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

I have ended up having to use a lip brush to apply. So if this came in a pot, I'd LOVE that. Or if the lipstick were thicker so that you could put it on at more of an angle, that'd prevent breaking. I really hope they fix that soon, because I want to be able to say this is perfect.

Not sure Ill spend the money to try another color. If you are looking for any sort of pink, dont pick this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is everything!! You do not understand how long I've been looking for a true light brown lipstick!! I want to say that for starters I have a true medium complexion and due to the formula of this lipstick, the shade comes up lighter on you. What you see in the tube is not what you get on your lips and that actually makes me happy in this instance. It swatches to this sheer, beautiful natural brown... almost like the brown version of your lips but better. It's neutral which is a huge plus and in my case, lip liner was not needed. I also purchased the shade Baby and I am also in love with that shade. Baby is a bit light on me, but honestly it's not an issue. It doesn't wash me out, but it does look amazing when I use a light brown neutral lip liner. For reference, I used Nyx Nutmeg lip liner and it worked perfectly, so think along those lines if  you need a good liner with the shade Baby. I definitely recommend these lipsticks if you're looking for a good wash of color and want something moisturizing and light weight. These will now be my go to work lipsticks since I prefer glosses, lip butters and moisturizing lipsticks for work so I can just keep them in my pocket to reapply during a busy shift.

reviews.review_text: LOVE the berry brown color! Honestly haven't found a color out there that's like this, it's really the perfect lip color- not too red and not too brown and 90s dark. Love the feel of it, super lightweight just like the name says. Keeps my lips hydrated as well which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite lipstick formulas of all time! Moisturizing and so wearable. It's almost a tinted balm but with a more robust and luxe feel. I've had this lipstick in Millennial for a year and it's been my most worn lipstick in that time. I wear it almost daily and I think it will be the first lipstick I pan. Color wise it's cooler than I typically like but still flattering. It doesn't have great staying power because of the balmy texture but that's to be expected. The only bummer is the lipstick is starting to break off the tube because it's so soft but that won't stop me from buying it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute colour, it does not have a full coverage which is for the lightweight and it looks like a tint without the stain.

reviews.review_title: Great formula, not a great variety of shade range
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is very moisturizing and the colour payoff is minimal - it's more of a tinted balm but you can build up intensity with 2-3 layers. The colour 'Baby' is more of a light baby pink vs. neutral pink. It's not a universally flattering pink shade. On medium skin, it tends to look cool toned and not very flattering. Could be a good colour for light skin tones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If there is a shade for you, this is so versatile. You can get a sheer, blotted look or build up for more intensity and a bit of shine. I find it hydrating and comfortable to wear, and it glides on like a dream. The tube is sturdy and attractive. This is my third tube, and the second one in the soft berry shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth, buttery, and lightweight. I could never get on the liquid/matte lipstick trend. This is right up your alley if you like bullets that are soft and moisturizing. This color is stunning great on my indian skin tone. It would look great on everyone.

reviews.review_title: Oh BABY, I am in love!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Baby is the perfect formula and shade for me. I can quit wasting time and money trying other lip products. This is a holy grail for me and I know why it's always sold out.  Oh BABY, I am in love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Another win for merit. Creamy not drying lipstick that wears nicely. Long wearing too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so flattering! It's silky smooth and looks beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a gorgeous and classy colour! my absolute favourite and is so moisturizing and smooth. it does need to be reapplied but it's amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this color so much. It does need to be reapplied throughout the day, but it is so moisturizing and light. I love my bold colors, but this is my everyday staple for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never wear lipstick, but I impulsively decided to try this, and I am obsessed. I am usually a gloss girl, but this is so comfortable and lightweight. Baby is a your lips but better color on light skin and so flattering. I wish MERIT made a lipliner!

reviews.review_title: Lovely pink that isn't too much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a fantastic color. Pink but not too pink. I'm a mature woman and I feel comfortable wearing it. The lipstick formula is sheer, and the lipsticks themselves are soft, so don't twist them out of the tube too far or they may break. Still worth buying, imho.

reviews.review_title: Deep berry shade glides on smoothly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely color. Glides on smoothly. A deep berry color. Not drying and stays on. Love it. Works great with my medium olive skin tone. Nice case as well. Will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love their entire makeup brand! This lipsticks doesn't dry out your lips, and gives them a perfect amount of color. My go to for natural makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought with my hard-earned money w no incentive, she's so cute, shade is actually accurate and it looks super natural yet glowyu2026 Feels like a more luxury lip formula- and packaging-wise, but is way less pricy than Guerlain or TF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this shade. I love an MLBB lipstick and this fits the bill. The Merit lipstick formula is sheer and hydrating, imparting just enough color without being too much. It has a very slight nice fragrance too.

reviews.review_title: Slip is not quite how I imagined it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit's lipstick formula and packaging. I was surprised when I saw the color of Slip in the tube, as it was cooler and darker than I expected. It pulls more brown on me than I expected, but I still like it. the

reviews.review_title: All the money is in the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipstick was just ok. It was very matte and not sheer at all-I can't see where the u2018lightweight' comes in. The colour was too dark on my skin. I felt I was paying for the luxurious packaging and the lipstick was overpriced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from the Sephora Favorites Set and I honestly did not expect to like the shade L'Avenue so much! It's a deep shade but I sheer it out and it looks like a good liptint. It feels lightweight and very pigmented. Will absolutely repurchase other shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is of my go to lipsticks, I purchased multiple shades! I find this specific shade to pull more orange than the swatches really show, at least on my skin tone.  Most of the time I apply it after applying lip balm to just get a sheer wash of color, but you can definitely layer it to build up the pigment. I find if you apply it without any lip balm first it can feel a little drying, but not terribly much. I'd say it stays on about an average amount of time for a bullet lipstick. I think the packaging is very fun as well, and has no problems staying closed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lipstick in the shade Tiger and loved the formula so much I purchased this shade too, and it ended up being one of my favorite lipstick shades in my collection! I find this specific shade to be very natural but lively on me, like I've just eaten some raspberries in the summer time. Most of the time I apply it after applying lip balm to just get a sheer wash of color, but you can definitely layer it to build up the pigment. I find if you apply it without any lip balm first it can feel a little drying, but not terribly much. I'd say it stays on about an average amount of time for a bullet lipstick. I think the packaging is very fun as well, and has no problems staying closed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So cute! I love that it is light weight and doesn't come Off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Can't live without it ud83dude2d best lipstick ever. It applies like butter, it's long wearing and packaging is just so luxurious

reviews.review_title: Perfect lipstick if you don't like wearing lipstic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Outstanding lipstick. Balm texture- no feel on lips- huge color payoff and lasted very long on me (as opposed to what others say)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade 1990 is absolutely beautiful. It is sheer and a beautiful brown shade. I use it almost every day because it can be an everyday shade or perfect for going out. I have ordered all the colors, but this is my favorite. The fact that it is not totally opaque makes it very user-friendly, and you don't even have to have a mirror to reapply. This is a totally honest, non-sponsered review :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula, but Tiger is absolutely not a brick red. Very reminiscent of a 90s mid shade brown. Returning to try another color bc it feels amazing on, but a brown lip is not what I'm going for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually hate wearing lipstick because I find them drying but this is a game changer. I absolutely love it. It leave my lips feeling hydrated and I like the natural looking color that isn't overwhelming

reviews.review_title: It's a little spendy but I love it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in three shades and intend to buy more. It goes on so smoothly. You can apply more layers and it doesn't cake. Even with multiple layers it feels weightless. No weird scent. I usually like sheer lipsticks or tinted balms styles but these are the lipsticks I keep handy now. The glossier Gen g, ultra lip and Clinique almost lipstick have been put away for now in favor of this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick in the shade L'AVENUE. It's gorgeous for all seasons! Suprised with the amount of pigment because merits products are normally so sheer. Favorite lipstick! Goes so well with the lip gelee in shade Marakech

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium golden-olive skin. The shade L'avenue is so beautiful. The formula lasts better than most bullet lipsticks that I have tried without being dry. It's easy to apply, smooth application and feels almost cushiony. It's hard to describe but this product is definitely worth the money. If the Sephora I was in had more shades, I would have been in big trouble.

reviews.review_title: Not as dark as you see in the photos BUT Amazing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula, the case, the color... it's EVERYTHING! And NOT too dark! You can build it up to darker. On first swipe it goes on quite sheer, but a few more swipes and you can build it up to the deepness you want without it feeling excessive. A win! I call this the perfect make-out lipstick because it doesn't have that annoying chalky base that dries up or bleeds. It's more balm-like and very hydrating, but not too slippy. It stays put without drying out. It's so goof-proof you can apply it without a mirror. The way it looks and feels, incredible. This is SO worth the price, and my dream brown lipstick that can be sheer-subtle or deeper depending on your mood. So it's actually a few lipsticks in one: the balm, the sheer barely there brown, the dark and sexy, and it's not going to ball up and look weird on your lips after eating, drinking, or kissing. A must have in dryer climates or on a kissing date. Get it, I wouldn't even bother with the lighter brown one Slip because you can get a light tone out of this, but also the benefit of a darker color in one. Win-win! LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the semi-matte texture and Baby color. Dislike the smell. Paris perfectly with Makeup Forever lip liner 3C.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly creamy. Wears away beautifully. Love Merit

reviews.review_title: Slip I love, Baby is not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging, gorgeous. I got the shade Slip, very creamy, flattering to lip texture. BUT I also got the shade Baby, which I hate, it is more dry and shows lip lines and I just do not like the color. On top of that I don't like the smell, sort of a perfume or powder floral smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! The color is just what I wanted - sort of brick-red, and fairly buildable. I love that lipstick is not drying, although I still put eos colorless chopstick underneath. I reapply a lot throughout the day because color fades easily, but that's an ok price for hydrated lips. Will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a redhead with fair, pink undertones and this is a holy grail lipstick for me. This is a gorgeous, flattering earthy brown that is so wearable. It's a light wash of color, slightly buildable, that provide a bit of shine. The consistency isn't actively hydrating but I don't find it drying like someone else said, and I live in a desert area and have dry skin. My sister is a redhead with more yellow/olive undertones and this is her favorite lip as well. I understand those who think this isn't worth it, at first pass this may seem like too little bang for your buck - but I have tried SO MANY light lipsticks, searching for a browny nude shade that is flattering for someone with my undertone and I've *never* had luck; browns are always too orange or pink or vampy. This cool brown is a true taupe/earthy tone and it looks good on every single person in my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely agree with others that the color baby isn't for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how this looked on me but I couldn't enjoy this product much because after a few times... the bullet broke. Ive tried so many times to put it back together, but as soon as I apply it, the whole bullet falls off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color, but very drying and patchy. Made my lips almost looks shriveled? Tried with lip balm and it didn't work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have neutral-warm, light skin and this is a perfect no-makeup makeup shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a lovely shade. I wore this all day and it barely faded.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice formula. This color is really pretty too. I just don't think it's worth the price because you can get something similar for cheaper. I'd say get it if you don't mind spending a little more for a lipstick but otherwise, get a nude pink from the drugstore

reviews.review_title: My current favorite. Lasts for hours!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick. It's a bit sheer so you can build up the color, but it's also possible to have a saturated look if desired. It lasts a long time and has a nice feeling like chapstick. Not too shiny and not to matte.

reviews.review_title: Only lipstick formula I care to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I need more colors- the formula and nuanced shades are truly remarkable. So comfortable and hydrating while still feeling a lil fancy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in two shades, L'avenue and 1990. Both work well for my South Asian skin tone. I like that this lipstick is buildable - put enough on and it stays even through a meal. Very pleased.

reviews.review_title: a staple in my everyday routine now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ahhh this is so good for a no makeup-makeup look. it's so lightweight and feels like a lip balm. is such an effortless and pretty look! 1990 is also such a beautiful 90's shade. looks amazing wth a dark brown lip liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first bought this and tried it on I hated it. It went on unevenly, the color made me look sickly. Even after trying it out more I ultimately decided to leave it in a drawer. Not sure why, but I decided to try it again after a long time. I had prepped my lips the night before with a lip mask. I added a tiny bit of lip liner, and I applied the lipstick. I was so surprised with how pretty it looked. It brought out the color of my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special about the formula but the component is very heavy and feels like good quality and I love the tone of this shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is good and the packaging is beautiful.  But I have some Revlon lipsticks that are practically the same formula as Merit but at a lower price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful design of lipstick. Not as red as I would like it to be but regardless still beautiful. Not sticky and feels buttery smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this lipstick! I honestly never liked lipstick before because I felt like it could be sticky and drying, but I feel like this lipstick isn't that! It feels smooth on my lips, and I really love the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These lipsticks by Merit are just okay. I have Millennial and Fashion. Millennial is darker on the lips than it looks in the tube. Fashion is a cool berry hue that I love but rarely use. Something about it makes my teeth look more yellow than they are, and I wipe it off every time. But it's still a nice color! All in all these are mid, at best. They don't last long and transfer to anything they touch. Feels like drugstore quality lipstick in a heavy stylish package.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color doesn't show up on my lips. Unfortunately, I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice shade for daytime/office. Goes on smooth and the packaging is chic.  However, I don't think I will repurchase because, as other have said, the lipstick broke after about a month making it very messy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade Millennial. Soft pink. Almost a u201cyour lips but betteru201d color. The packaging is very luxe. I knocked off a star because it doesn't have much staying power. Other than that, nice and moisturizing and a great lipstick.

reviews.review_title: A bit drying, but decent over allu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels weightless on the lips. Leaves a slight stain. Luxe packaging. A bit drying to my lips, thus one star off. Try to get them when Sephora has a sale. I tried this one and Baby.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful dark berry color! Really compliments my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found my all day lipstick! Does not dry out and leaves such a pretty satin finish not too glossy. I  will definitely purchase other shades !

reviews.review_title: Never thought I'd find a flattering brown shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a ghostly pale person, I never thought that I'd find a shade of brown lipstick that looked good on me. This shade has proven me wrong! I would give it 4.5 stars if I could, since it wears out unevenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: does not look like in the photos....definitely not a classsic pink, it's more like deep coral red, will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The most beautiful lipstick case I have seen! Worth it! Good amount of product, pigmented color. Not as hydrating as other lipsticks I have tried, but would recommend. Lasts all day, but I do find myself reapplying when lips feel dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this in Baby, which is described as neutral pink.  Hardly!  It is a beige with no color at allu2026makes me look dead.  There is no pink in that lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with these. Obsessed with aaaall of these. I don't usually shell out this much money for a lipstick, but I'm addicted. I have Tiger, Slip, L'Avenue, and 1990 now. So so pretty, fades beautifully, must have in my routine now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are hesitating on buying these, don't. The formula is so stunning.  I have a cool skin tone and I purchased several warm (Tiger, Slip) colors during the sale and they're all so pretty and complimentary on my skin regardless. The formula is hydrating and balmy with a hint of color that you can keep on sheer-ish side or build up. Packaging is A+ too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved Cabo but tiger was not pigmented enough and also not as red as advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Prettiest orange red ever! Very lightweight, longer lasting than I expected. Would repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipstick is smooth and creamy. Perfect for everyday wear. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a pink lipstick to match my medium/tan skin tone, and this is perfect! Most pink lipsticks completely wash out my skin tone or look too peachy or coral on me, but this is great. If your skin tone is similar to mine, you should definitely give the Millennial pink shade a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tis formula is the absolute best, hydrating and gorgeous. Super flattering. I have 2 shades Tiger and L'avenue, both beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula for this lipstick is so perfect. I got the shade Baby and it's my new everyday lipstick. But I went in store to look at the other shades and didn't like any of the other ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product was exactly like the description, light weight and tinted for a more natural look. The only complaint I had was the the lipstick wore off after an hour or so, so I had to reapply throughout the day. I got tiger and l'Avenue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From reviews, I expected this to be very hydrating and balm like. When applying for the first time, it felt more friction/stiffness than I imagined. It is very lightweight though, I forgot I was wearing lipstick after a while until I went to look in the mirror. I got this through the Sephora sparkly clean set, it was a great deal and the packaging is luxe but the formula is slightly drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have notoriously dry lips, any lipstick/tint tends to make my skin peel, but this formula is super lightweight, gentle, and hydrating. doesn't last very long or leave too much of an impression, but it's packaged nicely and adds a little bit of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful warm, Berry brown a shade! I love that you can build this lipstick up to either sheer or a more full coverage look! Non drying and the component is very luxe!
This color is absolutely stunning but it only lasts like 30 minutes before you need to reapply. The packaging feels luxurious. Could be much better for the price

reviews.review_title: Great Lipstick if it Actually Held Up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okayu2014 I absolutely love this shade and the feel of it. Howeveru2014 it broke after like 1 month. The whole lipstick just fell off when I was applying it one day. The same thing happened with their concealer stick. Merit is great, but they need to work on making their products more lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really beautiful color, I love that it's buildable so I can add to the opacity of the color, I never noticed it transferring onto anything when I wore it at a wedding, however it does fade fairly quickly. The packaging is also stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sheer so I think I'm going to put this on top of a full coverage lipstick & use this to add hydration.. Hoping I will be able to make some use of it as I'm not a fan of the blotchy look alone. It wears off super easily

reviews.review_title: Fashion shade turned very dark on lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On the fence about this formulation because the Fashion shade I bought turned exceedingly dark on me. I'm returning it, but I don't know whether to try a lighter shade in it and hope that it doesn't turn dark too. Hmmmm? turn dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color, texture and wear of this lipstick. I'm enjoying a lot of Merit products now and this one doesn't disappoint. Baby is a cool neutral pink and looks really natural. Also buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every video that I saw of this lipstick showed a good pigmentation but when I tried it is more like a balm with tint. I have to do a few swipes in order to get some color. good but not what I was expecting for $40

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These felt oookay, moved around a lot on lips, was all over my face. These are not very universal shades as 3 looked terrible on my light with peach skin tone, I looked completely off .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these merit lipsticks. They are beautiful and keep my lips hydrated and soft. Only downside is they don't last all day and I end up needing to reapply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, looks brick-like on my light/medium cool-toned skin. Unfortunately, it dries down very quickly to a stain and makes my lips feel dehydrated. I can't wear without coating aquaphor or another balm over the top. On the upside. it can easily be smoothed on without a mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this u201ccleanu201d lipstick due to my lips being very dry and I needed something that would keep my lips  moisturized and have less chemicals  This product does not retain moisture on my lips I have to be applying it every hour and the color fades very quickly. It's not worth the cost of this product. Very disappointed I should have returned it and got my money back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this lipstick in the shade L'Avenue! The shade is a perfect deep neutral berry - just what I like. It has a balmy texture and goes on semi-sheer - similar to my other favorite product Clinique's Almost Lipstick in Black Honey but with a much bigger pigment payoff. It is moisturizing, long lasting, and really easy to use. If you're someone who prefers a more natural look but still wants a little bit of glamour, this is perfect for you. It's my new go-to! The Sephora brand liner in Bad Apple is a near-perfect complement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a Middle Eastern/Indian background with golden-olive undertones. I purchased this lipstick in the shade 1990, hoping it would complement my skin tone, but unfortunately, the color appears too subdued. Aside from the color issue, the product's scent, packaging, and the waxy / oily application that gets all over everything remind me of a typical drugstore lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous color line and amazing formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm truly impressed with the formula of this lipstick. Don't get me wrong, a lot of lipsticks out there claim to be hydrating but still feel lacking. This one actually feels hydrating and and smooth. It glides to well making application so easy and clean. The color line is also very gorgeous, which I am obsessed with. It is sheer however. I love that about it because I can build my way up to the vibrancy that I want but just aheads up to anyone who might or know. It s she but buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sadly disappointed with this product, especially because I expected the color Slip to be the perfect nude for my medium tan, warm olive complexion. It was not. It blends into my skin, giving me the look of concealer lips. The formula on the lips was alright, but you can find equivalents at much more affordable price points. Because of the slip of this product, it broke at the base after 2 uses - it does not hold up well against warm weather either. I might try a different, bolder color some time in the future to give it a second chance, but for now I am not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. I wear this with char tilb. Nude brown lip pencil and it looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favorite lipstick formula and shade range. I now have this in L'Avenue, Baby, Slip, Tiger, Cabo, and 1990, and the only one I don't super love is Slip (a little too pale of a neutral for my high contrast features, but that's not really a Merit issue so much as it is a personal preference). The formula is so comfortable to wear, easy to reapply even without a mirror, and the colors are really flattering on my pale neutral olive skin. I also find they work really nicely as a cream blush! I hope to see them release additional shades in the future, but I really don't see myself buying any other lipstick formula now that I have this one. I haven't had any of the colors break or become loose in the tube, so I think maybe that's a user error issue? Or I've just been really lucky with the ones I've gotten.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Not for everyone, but definitely for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using 1990 for six months and I just bought Cabo because I love the formula. I haven't had any issues with it breaking but I am fairly gentle with my products. This is a very slippy, soft formula that creates a worn-in but moisturised look. It feels nice but it does bleed, which is why I don't think this formula will suit you if you prefer a crisp look. I haven't tried this lipstick with liner, but I do wear it to my office job and it does well with a put together look as well as a casual one, which is why I like it. This isn't like a Mac formula, for example, because it's sheer and the therefore you can wear it lightly for a sheer wash or build it up. But again, it does bleed and needs fairly frequent reapplying but I don't mind that since it doesn't dry out my lips like many lipsticks do.   1990 is a bit darker than I'd like for my skin tone, so I'll be using it as a fall/winter shade while I think Cabo is more complementary for a fair skin tone and can work year round. I do recommend swatching in store before you buy. I highly recommend it if you don't mind this specific type of formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin

But I've used it for two events now, and each time, I've ended up with breakouts (which I never get anymore since I'm so careful with my products and am on spironolactone!) near my mouth. Maybe the formulation has changed? This lipstick is NOT non-comedogenic or safe for acne-prone skin. And to boot, the color u201cBabyu201d photographed really cold and gray, and was only acceptable on my fair skin when topped with a berry lip color. Booooooo! Hiss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

I love it so much I even bought it in L'Avenue and 1990. If you're looking for clean, minimalist make-up that is high quality, this is it. I also love the cute packaging of all the products. Added bonus: the whole collection is carry-on friendly for travel, since most of it is solid/cream based! I bought the Full Collection on their website (the gift with purchase make-up bag was just too cute to pass up) and I'm so glad I did! I love every single one of their products!

reviews.review_text: L'avenue is a lovely berry shade on my dark skin.  I reach for it the most out of my collection and I consider it a nice shade to go with most makeup looks casual or full glam.  Very versatile.  I have not had any problems with the lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like a chapstick with color, the formula doesn't feel very elevated for the price and there's an odd, faint smell that I can't describe, but don't prefer in lip products-almost like chemicals and flowers but faint?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lipstick with high hopes. It has zero staying power and the color on is much darker and old lady ish. It's absolutely horrid

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become an everyday staple for me. Millenial is such a my lips but better shade, I tried to find a good dupe for it but to no success.  The texture is extra lightweight, slightly hydrating and buildable. I also like the faint makeup-y smell it has in the bullet, although if you're not a fan of scents, it shouldn't be a deal breaker since it disappears almost instantly upon application.  It does fade fairly quickly but that's something to be expected from a sheer, hydrating, bullet lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable on the lips. Feels lightweight and easy to apply. Adds that extra oomph to your lips if you want something subtle but enough to make a big difference with extra layers. Definitely recommend for minimal makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula. It looks great with our without a liner. It has such a hydrating formula that wears off in a natural way. It does transfer, however the formula is so buildable that you can do a tint look to a full opaque lipstick. I love the versatility of these lipsticks. I had been eyeing these and grabbed them during the sale. So pleased i did. there are a few oter shades i may try in the future. These shades I bought, I would definately repurchase. Highly recommend to someone new to lipstick because the formula is so buildable. Even the darker shades are vdery wearable and less intimidating on the lip than in the bullet. And i forget to mention that I love the packaging. I love the Merit packaging esthetic in general, and these are awesome. I love how you can display with the shade visible. I am really impressed with these. They sit right next to my high end favorites and compete with some great formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Broke. Only raised a bit and the bullet broke at the base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best lipstick I own! My lip color but better and it does not dry out my lips. I'm in love with all things Merit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It broke super fast. The color and formula are amazing though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and look on the lips. This can be patted on lips for a softer look or applied with more precision to get a more dramatic look. This also feels nice and light on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG!! This is the best lip product I have ever used. I got the shade fashion. The only way I can describe the look is cloud lips. I topped it with bel air lip oil to add some shine. I also used this as blush for a monochromatic look. I slept on this product for a long time thinking it wouldn't be that different than other formulas. I kind of assumed it was a trend due to the internets fixation with posting aesthetically pleasing products. The joke is on me. She is beauty and brains! I will not buy lipstick from any other brand for the seeable future. I ordered millennial, but I want them all. Also the packaging is so cute and luxury feeling.. thats like icing on the cake because I would buy this if it came in the cardboard style tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels like butter on your lips! The color looks amazing on as well

Baby is one of the best neutral pinks I have seen in a very long time.  It definitely does not pull orange which is something I always struggle with regarding a neutral pink.  I also have it in L'Avenue which can be worn light or build up to dark.  The lipsticks are moisturizing and last a good amount of time.  Definitely a good purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizing nude lipstick that doesn't make my lips look pale.

reviews.review_title: Fav red tone for brown girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite lipstick! Goes on effortlessly. Sometimes I only wear this and my face goes from meh to ready to go ud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is great. Color is super unflattering on my olive skin and this would look amazing on any tone darker. Coverage is medium & layers, personally I prefer a more pigmented or sheerer coverage, it's right in between

reviews.review_title: Took me 50 years to find a lipstick I love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 61 years old and have never worn lipstick, I've never finished a tube , everything I tried turned orange or too pink on me . I saw someone wear this on iG and randomly tried It  she has the same colorimh as me . I love it I now carry it with me and own 3 colours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect, every-day, simple, staple lipstick. Very neutral pink, this is my version of a daily nude lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the most beautiful nude shades especially for tan skin. I pair this with their lip oil in taupe and you get the perfect natural everyday lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say I really love this color. I want to try four other colors - I have been looking for neutral and orangey brick reds that suit me, and these are it. HOWEVER, the lipstick broke apart after a few uses. I am still using it all squished in the tube as I love the color and the texture on my lips (doesn't dry me out, has great color, and is buildable/layerable and stays smooth). Pls merit fix this problem, you're my fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is natural. The formula is amazing: I find it to be long-lasting, hydrating, and non-irritating, and lightweight. The shade Baby is a bit darker on me than I imagined with a slightly cooler tone-like a cool rose (fall vibes) on me rather than pink. I still like the colour, but it's not what I had in mind. I will definitely buy more shades though because the formula is great and I don't notice any scent at all and I'm very sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Girls with dark pigmented lips beware
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color but the formula barely shows up on my pigmented lips. I literally have to apply 3 times to get any color pay off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A cute, subtle pop of colour! Nice packaging and easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it has and an amazing color and feels super nice, and it wasnt a bad price either. totally worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loooove the lipstick itself  it is a lil drying over time but very easy to apply  the case broke i love how the packaging looks but it's a bit faulty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Switching to clean only makeup products and I absolutely love this lipstick! I'm in love with the colour Slip. I also got the colour Baby but it looked almost identical to Slip so I returned it. Don't bother buying both, you can't tell the difference on the lips. And if anything, Slip looked better on me than Baby

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ended up buying L'Avenue, 1990, Tiger and Slip. I love how moisturizing they feel and I find myself grabbing for a merit lipstick everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip color! Very flattering on medium/tan skin, it's my go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't dry my lips. The color is very flattering. Very comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best lipstick I have ever used. It's very hydrating and so lightweight. It doesn't leave residue and feels just like an amazing lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice lipstick with very nice colour. Almost a balm. However, it slides right off - it has next to no staying power. It also has a bit of a funny, sweet taste / smell at first but it goes away. I'll use it up because it's pretty (and makes a nice blush) but not sure I'd buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color and formula are like heaven, but like a lot of other users, after a few applications the stick broke and made it impossible to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are so beautiful. I have a few shades and they are all very lovely neutrals. Like the rest of Merit's line, these are a My skin but better aesthetic, so they are very hydrating, pretty subtle, and go one really easily with very little fuss. That the packaging is gorgeous is just a bonus!

reviews.review_title: Lipstick breaks off in the tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the shade Baby and used it maybe 7 times before the lipstick totally broke inside the tube. I would give this a much lower rating but the formula is nice and I love the color. I will not repurchase. I cannot justify the price if it breaks after a week's worth of use with a light hand. I didn't overextend it or anything it just fell apart. If you don't like to use a lipbrush (like me), skip this lipstick. Very dissapointing because the colors are gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Millenial is the perfect my lips but better shade and the formula is amazing. It's creamy, smooth, fragrance-free, and has zero flavor. It's the only lipstick I've ever used that looks better unlined. I'm a huge Merit Beauty fan and can't wait for more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: millennial is the perfect natural pink. I was worried it would be too bold but it's so subtle. it's my new everyday lip color!

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but the product isn't useable
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour and consistency are good! BUT the lipstick broke on my second use. I exchanged for a new one and the exact same thing happened.   So many reviews with the same problem. It's not just me and it's happened twice. Love this product but due to the nature of it 100% will not repurchase as it's not even useable? So annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a matte lipstick kinda gal because I don't like transfer, but this lip stick is great! It's moisturizing and has great color payoff. While it does transfer, I think the color wears off very nicely like a tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite nude lipsticks. Nice texture, feels moisturizing (but not smudge-proof), want to try it in every shade! It's just not that affordable, u2014 would love if there could be a mini version, that's cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this is my new favorite lipstick formula. Even though it's a bit stiffer than other cream formulas, it stays hydrating and soft on the lips, and doesn't cling to any dry patches. Can't wait to try more shades.

reviews.review_title: Perfect addition to a light makeup look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lipsticks are so beautiful!! They're not matte. But they're a perfect addition to a light makeup look! I have them in 5 shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a perfect sheer brown. even though the packaging broke and the lipstick smooshes into the side the color and formula is perfection. there is a drugstore dupe i'd look at but this color is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich formula lasts a long time. I have lips that chap/ dry easily and this did not have that effect. As others have mentioned, the color is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this lipstick. It is the perfect shade of cool toned true pink. It feels so buttery and smooth on the lips- it has a bit of a waxy quality to it that reminds me of a lip balm. It has good lasting power, and also fades off so beautifully. I find it doesn't cling to any dry patches on my lips, and it doesn't emphasize the fine lines on my lips. I have dozens of lipsticks on my top shelf and find I'm always reaching for this. It's such a great formula that feels incredible, doesn't dry out my lips, and is the perfect shade for my cool toned skin. I'm usually skeptical of clean beauty brands since they tend to expire really quickly, so I was kinda biased against this product but it's been a favourite for months now! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've had drug store lipstick better than this. Color was very sheer, and patchy. Looked like I just had a glass of Kool Aid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the color and it feels so light and moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always bought lipsticks and never worn them because I put them on, go out, eat something, all the lipstick comes off and I'm too lazy to put it back on properly. That's on me. This lipstick has been my antidote! It goes on with the ease and hydration of a balm, lasts remarkably well, and can be touched up seamlessly without needing a full redo. I got Tiger, loved it all season for a wintry brick, just got Cabo for a springy warm red. I prefer warm-based lip colors, which are tough to find - and this whole line delivers. Beware if you don't like warm tones. I love that you can wear these colors sheer, like a tinted balm, or at a juicy near-full opacity. The formula is also very hydrating for me. No cracking or flaking after wear. In fact, the morning after a night out in this lipstick, my lips feel distinctly soft. This has become my everyday lipstick.

reviews.review_title: If you love neutrals, every shade is a total win
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful hydrating natural finish formula. I have four shades, and they're the most beautiful neutrals I've found. I love them with the rest of the merit line for that super easy no-makeup make up look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick feels creamy and wonderful. I'd love to use it, but I haven't found a color that suits me. Slip was too edgy, Baby too light. I thought L'Avenue might suit my neutral-cool skin tone, but it's really too dark for me. Many of the shades lean warm. So far, only the Sangria lip oil works for me.

reviews.review_title: Not my color, but great formulation for natural ma
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the formulation but the color was too orange for my light neutral skin tone. If I apply it lightly, the color is fine. But if I use another swipe it's too orange. That's just my preference. I'm sure this will be amazing on other people.

reviews.review_title: Love this lipstick formulation and color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formulation and how it feels on my lips. I think it lasts a long time considering it's more of a balm. The pink color is perfection on my light medium skin tone. I hope they will always carry this color since it is my go to neutral pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't like the color, texture, and smellu2026 reminds me of play dough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hope this lipstick never goes away. I have very dry lips, especially in the winter, and usually lipstick tends to gather in the lines on my lips. This is such a hydrating formula that it not only doesn't gather, it smoothes out the lines and is super hydrating. I got the color slip which is the most beautiful neutral-brownish shade that worked perfectly with my skin tone. I like to pair it with the taupe lip oil to make it last even longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade u201cBabyu201d is perfect for my fair, cool-toned skin. I love the formula too. Went back and bought u201cL'Avenueu201d later. Quickly falling in love with Merit. Will def purchase more from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is nice and weighty. The color is nice, however I can feel this on my lips and I don't like that. I also feel like it looks un-set on.. not a fan.  But it is good quality so I gave it away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for over a month and I love the look. It's the perfect neutral with a little pop. The Lipstick is nice and creamy and has decent staying power. I also purchased the shade Tiger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade 1990 and it's definitely gonna be a staple of mine, it's sheer and lightweight formula is pretty nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Baby and I find it to be a very nice everyday color for me.  I have been using this lipstick non-stop since I got it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like unique formula and colors of this lipsticks. But, sad it brokered quickly and smell like old lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a nice brown lipstick. This is not it. This did not have any pigment whatsoever. My lips looked bare except for a little shine. Liked the packaging, it seemed to offer a decent amount of moisture, and it is a clean product, but there was not enough pigment for me to even consider this to be a lipstick. The CD brown is so much better. More expensive but at least I get actual color on my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A staff recommended this shade for me and matched it with Anastasia Dusty Rose lipliner. I love it. It is a perfect neutral muted pink. On my lips it looks slightly mauvy. For the first time, ever, someone told me she really liked my lip stick colour! As a busy mom of 2 kids, I feel this colour adds a touch of glam without being too much. The lipliner elevates the look even more. I'm tempted to try other colours!

reviews.review_title: i'm a lipstick person again finally
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: every single lipstick annoys me because they move out of place orrrr if they stay in place it's crusty and nasty. this is lightweight and fabulous. i am now a lipstick person again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased 3 (Millennial, Baby and Fashion) and I love them all.  People seem to want long wearing but I'm always concerned with potentially toxic chemicals applied to my face.  Merit does a great job of hydrating, staying put with colors that are meant to enhance rather than cover.  Your make-up needs/expectations change as you move through life and Merit seems to know exactly what the 45+ crowd needs and wants.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried for the first time after seeing an influence gush over it, and I can see why! It's better than my MAC lipsticks. They're way more hydrating and silky smooth. The color is subtle and perfect for a nude-pink. I already added another color to my cart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too much lipstick feel. Didn't last long. Definitely not worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a lot of people talking about loving this lipstick but it has no coverage and it's very patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: tiger is a PERFECT mlbb shade for me, a beautiful brown with red undertones (so fellow fans of terracotta shades, this is for you). it's sheer, yes, but buildable and wonderfully smooth. not patchy in the least, and it doesn't settle into lines. plus, the packaging is INCREDIBLY luxe. absolutely love it, and will probably pick up 1990 soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought one, then another, then all the rest. They are THAT good, but Tiger is probably my favorite. These lipsticks can give a subtle, laidback look or can be intensified in a few swipes. They are moist without being sticky and don't settle into fine lines, and there isn't a dud in the bunch. In particular, I love Tiger, Millennial, and Cabo. The ONLY downside is that these are soft and can break, so I recommend extending the lipstick to just beyond the tube and no more just in case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glides on my lips and love the way it gives a subtle shine to them!

reviews.review_title: I hate lipstick - except this one
reviews.review_text: I am a chapstick and lip gloss girl through and through. However, I bought this for a wedding that required more glam than just lip balm and I fell in LOVE. The application is so easy and doesn't require intense precision. It feels like a lip balm on and has a wonderful amount of buildabke pigment. I want every single color now!!

This lipstick is SUPER sheer. If you have any pigmentation in lips, know this will not show up the color in the tube. Also, it has a sheen that isnt flattering on dry lips. Overall, very disappointing.

This formula is SO comfortable, exactly what it claims to be: a lightweight lipstick. It can be worn as a sheer wash of color or layered for a more punchy pop of color. Either way, it feels as weightless as a lip balm and the finish is very naturalu2014 not too shiny, not too matte. The color L'Avenue is a gorgeous universally flattering red. I'm very fair, so most reds are overpowering on me, but this is just muted enough that it doesn't look off, and just bright enough that it's still a statement red if you build it up that way. Worn sheer, it almost resembles Clinique Black Honey. Gorgeous shade, beautiful formula, I can't wait to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing and the colour is just ud83dudc4c Literally goes with everything and the colour is lovely. I would purchase this again in a heartbeat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color, but it can be duped. Formula is nice, but it's basically a tinted lip balm. Coverage/color only builds to a certain point before it becomes gloopy. Worst of all, the bullet broke off while I was applying it because it's so soft. I give up and I'm going back to real lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up online before seeing in person. The PERFECT neutral. So glad to find this color and the fact it is creme instead of matte. New lip wardrobe basic!

reviews.review_title: great formula but not really pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this lipstick is SUPER hydrating, lightweight, and buildable!! only concern is that it's def more brown than pink on me so i don't think it's a neutral pink

reviews.review_title: Need many layers for color to show
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color looked so pretty in the pictures. The brown color doesn't come through and very low color payoff on my medium mauvy lips. I have to really rub it in for multiple layers for any color to show. Its more mauvy brown and than just brown and looks just mauvy on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour and formula are good enough, but the lipstick completely broke off the second time I used it. I've tried melting it + freezing it to get it to attach again, but it always breaks again. Disappointing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so pretty and light weight it doesn't have a smell and its very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't get the hype.  This is like lip balm.  I got the colour Baby which barely shows up on my very pale skin (I am usually the palest shade in foundation.)  I did understand that it would be sheer, but it's comparable to the Ilia lip balm.  I guess this is really for people who don't usually wear lipstick.  I like the Merit lip oil in Taupe so much better.

reviews.review_title: This lipstick will change your life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely wear lipstick and not part of my regular routine. I've tried other Merit products and was so impressed I wanted to try this. It's absolutely perfect. It's subtle but a showstopper. Will definitely buy again and 1000% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of the hype but decided to treat myself during the sale. millennial is truly the perfect pink for my skin tone (not too warm or cool, not too light or dark). the sheer consistency makes it look natural and feel comfortable. packaging is gorgeous too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on like a dream! Smooth application and a rich finish. I have Baby and Millenial and love both shades. Creamy and lightweight - just as described.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on and got so giddy, and (not gonna lie), a little emotional. 10 out of 10, five stars, turned up to 11. This is truly a lipstick I hope they make forever, because I want to wear it as my signature always. If you're a natural-look girlie who wants to look polished and pretty, get this. It's all there for me, from the natural pigmentation to the effortlessly gliding and moisturizing formula. Period.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this lipstick twice and on the third day the lipstick broke off. I am carefully with my products and hadn't pushed too hard or anything. It fell into the bathroom sink at my work, so it's not like I could even pick it up and try to fix it. Waste of money. I saw a lot of people raving about these, but they're nothing special and clearly crappy quality. Paid 20-something dollars for 3 days of application. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is creamy and hydrating and has beautiful colour but it rubs off on everything and needs constant reapplication. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lipstick. I haven't been able to wear lipstick/stain for over 5 years, no matter the brand or product, all have led to my lips peeling/cracking. This is the first product I've tried in that time that hasn't irritated my lips, and has in fact left them feeling better. Baby and Fashion are both great colors. Baby is a perfect color for everyday. The color pay off is great and buildable. It does transfer when eating/drinking but even so it stays on until I wipe it off-even hours later. I haven't experienced the lipstick breaking but have been very careful with it after reading reviews. Give this one a try y'all!

reviews.review_title: harder to build up color for darker skin tones

reviews.review_text: i'm dumb and just didn't read that it was sheer. I got the color deep brown so it was a good nude for me but bc of how sheer it was it kinda blended in with the rest of my skin. despite that I think it's going to be part of an everyday item for me. I will say anyone else darker than me maybe think hard about it. I have to reapply a lot throughout the day to maintain the color. I added a (very musty) pic for reference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Perfect nude lip for darker skin tones!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lipstick!  It's so comfortable to wear and it's my perfect nude. I lined my lips with the Makeup Forever Wherever Walnut and it's chefs kiss ud83dudc8b It has a glossy effect which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I really like this formula.  It's smooth, a bit sheer, and has good staying power without being overpowering.  I got the L'avenue berry brown color, and the color doesn't really have any berry tint - it's more of a warm red brown.

reviews.review_title: Slip and Baby pull super Gray on the lips!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color pulls super gray. I wanted to love these so badly, I got both Slip and Baby which seemed like the most popular mlbb shades but both of them pull so gray and ashy on me. I have light yellow asian complexion. I can wear both warm and cool tones and I actually prefer cooler tones but these will suck the life right out of you. Made me look like I was wearing straight up gray on my lips. I even tried it with lighter foundation. Sad because they look so beautiful swatched! Just be mindful if you have a warmer, light complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There isu2026 nothing special about this. The component is pretty and high quality, but the lipstick is not a fun texture. It does not last on your lips well at all. There are lipsticks that are the same price that are outstanding quality, and there are maybe 12-15 dollar quality.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for going out or daily use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
