reviews.review_text: Love the formula and color but dried my lips out after each use. Took a couple weeks for my lips to bounce back. I would've returned it if I hadn't thrown away the box already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cabo is a gorgeous neutral red shade. I tend to prefer a natural makeup look, and this vibes super well with that. Gives a very lip bitten look. I dab on lightly, but the color would build nicely too. Really nice soft feel to the product. I really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely not the colour I expected. The formulation initially feels kind of hydrating but then it feels drier later on and it does not last long you need to reapply it for sure. Again I don't mind reapplying but I am not satisfied with the colour payoff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful, very easy to wear lipstick with a light, comfortable, balmy feel and slightly sheer, easily buildable color. It has a satin finish with a bit of a gleam to it on the lips. I don't find the formula as moisturizing as some seem to, but it isn't drying either -- kind of like goldilocks in that respect.  I love this shade, which on me is much more berry than brown, more like a bright burgundy, and bolder than I expected. In my collection of favorite berry-brown lipsticks (Huda Habibi, Pat McGrath Flesh 7, Lisa Eldridge Painterly, Fenty Slip Shine Cookies & Cocoa) this one leans the most berry and has the brightest, boldest color. The bullet feels sturdy and I enjoy the paddle-like shape. The color has very good longevity too. Definitely a win for me and I would like to try some of the other shades (1990, Millenial) eventually.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes your lips look really small . Lipstick is very drying, Hardly any product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sooooo excited for Baby after seeing the swatches but unfortunately, it's not for me. I have light olive-toned skin and this came up totally gray on me. Buyer beware -- if you've got any hint of green in your skin this shade is not for you!  The formula was all right consistency-wise...it didn't really impress me but it wasn't bad either. I do feel like with the lighter color, the lines of my lips were much more visible. I would say go for a darker color with this product or be prepared to use more than one color with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Accurate as described. More to everyday look. Not the most pigmented lipstick and have to swipe to build up the colour. It gives relaxing feeling with the colour and texture. Very hydrated and comfortable on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula and color are great. I returned Tiger, but have been wearing down L'avenue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in the color. Much more brown than pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It started with just the one lipstick, then another, and now, I have all but three shades from this lipstick range. It's a great every day lipstick, one I can toss in my bag to reapply throughout the day, as needed, and without a mirror. This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   WHAT I LIKE:  *  Lightweight  *  Hydrating *  Easy to apply - no need for a mirror  *  Goes on and feels like a balm  *  Leaves lips moisturized  *  Sheer but buildable coverage  *  Satin finish  *  Wears comfortably on the lips  *  Great wearable shade selection  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: *  Would love to see more shades introduced into this collection   FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS: *  Vegan  *  Clean *  Cruelty Free *  Fragrance Free  BUY, BUY, BUY ud83dudecdufe0f or BYE-BYE ud83dudc4bud83cudffc?: *  An easy BUY, BUY, BUY for me! ud83dude0d
LOVE - the finish, texture, smell! Getting another color soon! It's so easy to apply and the packaging is awesome!

reviews.review_title: love the color, but structurally weak
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing color, texture, and price point. Perfect for fall, it's not too warm brown (orange), which i like. the only downside is that it's not very structurally strong. The lipstick stick broke after two uses.

reviews.review_title: I am thrilled with this lipstick.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Outstanding product. I am so pleasantly surprised. The quality of this shade u201cBabyu201d is of the same quality of another big French brand with fancy, quilted handbags I have spent $40 on for years. That's not why I bought it. I saw the shade in an advertisement and I am a sucker for a fleshy pink/brown shade. I'm headlong for 60, and at my age, neutral is better. It also means I am concerned about the condition of my skin. This lipstick stays put for long enough to make me WANT to put more on. It's buildable. I like to swish it and brush it and perfect the shape of my lips when I go out. I just put one pass of it on each lip on Sundays when I just don't feel like making up. It looks so creamy because it is creamy. I will buy this again and again. This was a birthday gift to myself and it's the best gift I got. Thank you, Merit, especially for being Made In Italy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the lipstick stays on for maybe 30m and dried my lips for some reason. i tried using a lip balm before putting it on but even that didn't help

reviews.review_title: AMAZING formula, but MEH shades for warm tone ppl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry lips and these don't dry me out. They literally feel like a balm without the worry of them slipping and bleeding outside lip lines. One of the best lipstick formulas I've ever tried.   HOWEVER, despite their claims of these universal shades being flattering on everyone...I disagree. Also, the pictures online are NOT ACCURATE at all. I have light, very warm-toned skin, and am colour analyzed as a true spring. I bought Fashion, Cabo, and Tiger. Fashion pulls too cool-toned and purple on me and darkens my brightness / natural glow. It's not a soft berry as descripted and leans more plum-pink. Although a warmer a shade, Tiger is very brown IRL and also darkens my brightness. There is no trace of red on me. Cabo is perfect though -- a bright red orange.  Merit, please make more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has become my favorite daily lipstick. I love the emollient texture and perfect color. At my age, late 60's, I worry about lipsticks creeping into the fine lines around my lips but this lipstick stayed in place without creeping and continued to moisturize my lips for several hours. I did use use Natasha Denona's lip liner which worked perfectly. This is my go to daily lipstick - I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick so much! The color is beautiful and the texture is very comfortable and hydrating. The color is buildable which makes it perfect for any occasion. I don't like spending a lot of money on lipsticks but honestly, this is totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a red lipstick that would work with my features for at least 12 years. This is it. I am very picky with my lipstick. I have a thinner upper lip and a more fuller lower lip, so I find that red lipstick accentuates that, which is not a look that I really enjoy. I also find that red lipstick makes any discoloration on my face more prominent and noticeable. I have tried several different brands, like CT, Mac, NARS, Urban Decay, Dior, etc. I find them all disappoint me, either too drying or not enough pigment or too much pigment. Merit's Tiger was the entire package for me. It is as hydrating as a lip balm, and the colour is so beautiful. I can layer it without it looking thick and streaky. It really pulls together my look as well - I have dark brown hair and dark hazel eyes, so it completes my aesthetic. It will be my go-to lip product for fall and winter. Definitely give it a try. I will be getting Baby and Cabo next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The signature lip is a  classic lipstick with a more hydrating feel. It is a solid lipstick with opacitity, but not insanely opaque. I am really pale and many shades look too dark on me, but the shade u201cbabyu201d is the perfect neutral rose color. In love and have been wearing every day. I have classic lip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this a few times and not only is it the perfect nude, but it keeps my lips soft and doesn't dry them up. I want another color now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating formula makes lips look smooth and has medium staying power. I love the color Slip - such a beautiful warm neutral. This would be a 5/5 except for the garbage packaging - the lipstick broke after a few uses, making it challenging to apply now. Also the packaging is unnecessarily large and doesn't fit easily into a small wristlet or clutch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so nervous I wouldn't be able to pull off Cabo, as it is a bolder lip than I usually wear. However, I was so wrong! I already have and love several other Merit Signature Lips, but this was the most pleasant surprise! :)

reviews.review_title: Two stars off of a potential five star lip product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ticked two stars of what could have been a five star lip product if they correct these two issues. I purchased the shades 1990 and slip. 1990 beautiful neutral brown, leans more cool. Slip is also beautiful, is a neutral brown lighter shade leaning more warm. The first issue I had with these products is the scent. It's that sent that makes your throat feel dry for hours once you apply. A very subtly but oignant scent in the throat. Also, I live in Canada. It is a cooler season here. And my lip product still broke even when I didn't turn it too far up or apply intense pressure when applying. This is so unfortunate as I love the texture and consistency of this lip product. I can overlook the flaws for now for the formula, but I don't know if I'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really feel let down by this shade. I was hoping for the soft, neutral pink that's shown in the photos, but that's not even close to what it is in real life. In person, u201cBabyu201d is a very brown leaning mauvish purple. Not at all what I was hoping for. The lipstick itself smelled old upon arrival too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely texture, buildable and extremely lightweight. Lasts a surprising long time!   Millennial is my perfect everyday

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the product and bought it twice but falls apart quickly after several uses. The 2nd time I purchased it I was careful about how much pressure I used when applying and it still broke. Should not fall apart so easily at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited months for this shade to come back in stock, and it was well worth it!  I got the shade Baby, and it is the perfect lip color on my light/medium, cool/neutral complexion. Also love the packaging. It's perfect!pacpackaging. ,it'sperfeverythingaaabout it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i bought two shades of these and i really wanted to love them but the product broke in half on both after the first few uses so i returned them. 2 stars bc the formula and the colors were so pretty but they're too pricey to fall apart that quickly :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning product. I bought 1990 and l'avenue and I basically need the whole range now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried most lipsticks. My favorites have been Chatecaille and Lisa Eldridge. However, I was so impressed with this formula that I had to write a review! I think this is the best lipstick release in years. The formula u2013 it's lightweight and semi-sheer BUT nicely pigmented and sturdy (will not come off the minute you take a sip of something). The colors are also all gorgeous. I have Slip, 1990, Cabo, and Tiger. Not a dud in the bunch. Lastly, what a great price. You can't lose u2013 buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I simply love this formula and the colour is stunning! It layers incredibly well and lasts. Plus, it's easy to reapply if need be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade L'avenue is absolutely stunning. The texture of the lipstick isn't too heavy and can be layered for a natural or more intense look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible color, beautiful glide on, easy to Apply, no Fragrance or flavour.

reviews.review_title: An everyday staple for that extra pop!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a sheer lipstick or balm that was long-lasting, hydrating but not sticky, with a soft non-shiny and non-shimmery finish. What sealed the purchase for me was this shade. My lips already have a natural mauve shade, but the tint in this lipstick brightens it up nicely. Plus, it can be layered for a more dramatic effect. I like to tap this on for that subtle pop of color. Highly recommend! natural

reviews.review_text: (In the pic, I wear Slip and add some red on it. Just Slip alone, it is too natural that it gives me a little bit toned-down my lips but better looks) It's so buttery and soft I'm always into lipsticks and I've never used one like this before it applies so smoothly and it's really lightweight  My lips feel dewy and smooth but never feel uncomfortable with it I want to try other colors too I definitely understand the hype and I believe it will be my go-to lipstick for my base color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: the formula is great, love that i's sheer and buildable and pretty lightweight Cons: don't find the formula to particularly lightweight, the product is so creamy it's very delicate and breaks easily  however, my biggest issue is how yellow leaning the neutrals and reds are i own both slip and 1990, and of the two, i will keep slip but 1990 is far too yellow leaning which makes my lips look almost dirty? i can't explain it, and make my teeth look quite yellow too.. not flattering :/ i noticed tiger has pretty strong yellow undertones too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's sheer but buildable, hydrating without being too slippery, and the color is beautiful, similar to the Bobbi Brown crushed lip color in cranberry but more brown. Bonus points for the luxe packaging and subtle, practically nonexistent scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i purchased as soon as it was back in stock and i havent put it down! tiger will be perfect for fall. it has a balmy formula that wont leave your lips dry. the only con is you will have to reapply often, but its worth it!

reviews.review_title: Not pink at all for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The quality of this product is not disputed. It applies beautifully and is very creamy and moisturizing.  I purchased Millennial, and what I received is most definitely not a classic pink.  This color was more like a neutral brown tone.  The sticker on the case said Millennial, but sadly, it was not the classic pink I wanted.  I'll keep it, and perhaps re-gift this.  I have horrible luck buying lipstick online !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty orange red with a creamy texture. Wish the longevity was better but with liner it can last to lunch time but not through it certainly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is as perfect as everyone says. Sheer but buildable, emollient but not too emollient, smooth but not melty. It truly is a gorgeous formula. However, the colors in person as significantly different than shown on the site! Though I'm not sure it's their fault as I also watched quite a few YouTube videos. The two shades I bought, Tiger and L'Avenue, are much browner than they appear here. If I just saw Tiger I'd never think to refer to it as a red. It looks straight up like a rusty warm brown to me. Similarly, L'Avenue hardly looks berry at all to me. I was hoping for something a bit brightened like Black Honey, but again this pulls very very brown and also quite deep. I think these are good if you're going for a 90s look, but I like a bit of brightness to my lip shades to brighten up the complexion and these are lacking in that. It's a bummer because I hate returning used products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought three colors: millennial, cabo, and l'avenue. Millennial was okay, but washed me out. cabo was too orange and showed through lip cracks. l'avenue was the perfect MLBB with a slight hint of red. For reference, my other favorite MLBB is bobbi brown crushed lip in telluride, which pulls more brown than red.   L'avenue is perfect for a slight blot on the lips for someone who wants to feel put together, natural, and work appropriate with their makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair-light skintone and I would say my lips are pretty pigmented too.  The color Baby really surprised me - in a GREAT way...  It is my perfect neutral.  It is almost the same color as my lips - almost.  But it is a hair lighter - not too light though!  It doesn't give concealer lips and it actually leans more on the cool-toned side than an actual neutral which is what I love about it!  It's the perfect lip to wear with a bold eye look or smokey eye.  The formula is phenomenal.  Easy to wear and has a satin finish but doesn't wear off too quickly.  But when it does wear off it does so with grace.  I also have the shade 1990 and that is another favorite lip color - if you are afraid that it will be too deep (on lighter skintones) - it won't be.  It can be applied with a sheer color with just a couple swipes or built up, but it never gets too dark.  The only issue is that these lipsticks tend to break easily!  The warmth from being in your pocket can be enough to have it break.  And definitely don't leave it in your car on a warm day.  I have broken 2 of the 1990 lipsticks so far.  But the formula and these colors are so nuanced that it is worth it and they still get 5 stars!  Try shade Baby before it goes out of stock again!   ...  P.S. I have Dior lipsticks.. Givenchy... Gucci... as well as Milani, Loreal, Maybelline... Mac, Makeup By Mario, and the list goes on.  THESE lipsticks are my favorite formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lipstick, feel lightweight and the color is buildable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeeee! Best lipsticks in the market hands down!

Overall, Im glad I found a perfect neutral nude for everyday wear and its the first brand ever to work for me other than Mac Lipstick.

reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try these and they did not disappoint!! The texture is great and even once that fades, it leaves a lovely amount of colour behind.   The pink is an easy everyday for me.

reviews.review_text: So i ordered this in the color L'Avenue first and was a bit dissapointed by the color. Tried to love it but it looked wayyy pinker in person so i had to return it. HOWEVER, the formula was so good i decided to give it a second chance and ordered Slip and 1990. The formula is smooth and light and feels very comfortable. I do wish they were a bit longer lasting but they're vert moisturizing so i guess that makes it hard to achieve. I would describe it more as a very tinted lil balm but i don't really mind it, makes it a great everyday lipstick for when you don't wanna wear alot of makeup.

reviews.review_text: The most adorable pink shade!!! Hydrating, smooth, and buildableu2026 love

reviews.review_title: LOVE THE LIPSTICK BUT IT BREAKS INSIDE TUBE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product itself, nice feel, neutral flattering color (Slip), good ingredients! BUT the lipstick broke and quickly became a mess inside the lid. This happened twice.   Illia balm provides a similar texture/sheerness and has not broken yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lipstick formula & colour of all time but the stick has started to shift in the bullet making it difficult to apply without breaking the lipstick or smudging it on the side of the bullet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best decisions! Very nice pigmentation and formula. The packaging is so luxurious and incredible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Even better than expected! Buildable, comfortable, but not too slippy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Might be my favorite lipstick of all time. I suffer from chronically dry lips, and have a need to reapply some sort of lip balm such as the Laneige Sleeping Mask or Too Faced Pillow Balm every couple hours so it's hard for me to find a daily driver lipstick that can substitute products like that. This lipstick literally feels like a hydrating lip balm and beautifully pigmented lipstick in one. It's really hydrating yet also light and has great staying power. It's probably the most I've spent on a lipstick but I think it is totally worth it. The color 1990 is also beautiful and the perfect amount of brown yet not too stark. I'd love to try Tiger next.

reviews.review_title: So lovely! I would buy again many times over
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so beautiful and the formula is lovely, beautiful, and comfortable. The application is smooth and satin so you have a bit of shine. It's perfect for everyday and every event: from work, to daycare pickup, a special occasion, and beyond. I am so happy with this purchase! I also have the L'Avenue shade and I am looking forward to purchasing more options when they are back in stock.

reviews.review_title: So lovely!!! Can't wait to buy in other colors!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so beautiful and the formula is lovely, beautiful, and comfortable. The application is smooth and satin so you have a bit of shine. It's perfect for everyday and every event: from work, to daycare pickup, a special occasion, and beyond. I am so happy with this purchase! I also have the Millenium shade and I am looking forward to purchasing more options when they are back in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3 of these lipsticks so far and love them all.  Millenial is my lips but with a touch of extra coral.  the formula is comfortable and creamy, and I tend to reach for these daily.

reviews.review_title: perfect for a light and nude makeup look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: millennial is perfectly light on the lip it is sheer with minimum pigment but the color is great not too red nor too purple  perfect for a light and nude makeup look!   the lipstick does have a light smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lipsticks. The texture is great and not at all drying. This color is a bit too dark so it will be great for a winter color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is smooth and creamy. I also like the colour. it has no staying power though so it will come off it you eat or drink something. But the colours are unique so I've decided to keep the lipstick I got.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought both Millennial and Slip and love the color but LOVE, LOVE LOVE the consistency. Doesn't make my lips peel. Super moisturizing. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing/hydrating and super comfortable. Sheer to buildable color and really pretty options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty!! I love thats its sheer and buildable!! It makes my lips look natural but better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula, substantial but moisturizing. The color is a perfect combo of berry and brown. It is a beautiful update to a 90's brown lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect pinky nude beige for everyday. Love the packaging. When I close the lid it doesn't make a loud u201cclacku201d sound. Everything about the product feels luxurious from the copper brown lid and the gold encasing. It doesn't have a particular scent. The texture is balmy and not super glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about how good this lipstick really was from all the hype but I must say this truly does stand up to the hype. It is sheer and buildable but at least 1990 on me doesn't ever go anywhere near opaque. It is lightweight and just feels silky on the lips. Also if you have naturally pigmented lips these will probably translate differently on you than someone with light colored lips like me. I was worried 1990 would be too dark because it is described as dark brown. In the tube yeah but on the lips it's not too dark on my fair skin. I most usually don't think you have to pay high prices for lipstick (except luxury brands usually nail down those murky, unusual shades) but this is very worth the price. Everything from the packaging to the performance screams luxury. I will definitely be picking up slip and baby as soon as they're back in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This newest product from Merit is really high quality and fits beautifully with the rest of their line.  The formula is very hydrating and has a satin or semi matte finish.  It's also very versatile- it's easy to do a blotted and softer look, but you can also layer for more of a pigmented glam look.  I've already bought this in additional colors and love using this as an every day product.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Formula, Millennial didn't work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, these lipsticks are amazing. Great color payoff and a wonderful rich, almost waxy, classic lipstick feel. I love it. I first bought this in the shade Baby, but was worried it was too warm on me, so I bought Millennial thinking it would be a better match for my cool-undertone. Totally wrong. Baby is more brown/purple color, and Millennial is more of a coral/brick-red color. I'll be keeping Baby and making it work, and giving Millennial to a friend with warm undertones that looks stunning in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Several of my favorite YouTubers convinced me to try this lipstick, and it really is a marvel. From the jazzy, hefty case through application and wear. Signature Lip feels slightly glossier than Burt's Bees Lip Balm, but keeps my lips feeling nourished for several hours. The color doesn't get bunched up in my lip wrinkles too badly, lasts forever, and I can build it up from sheer to kinda vampy with a couple of layers. I'm glad L'Avenue was one of the few left in stock, because the color is SPOT-ON. I haven't liked a traditional bullet lipstick this much in years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging alone is gorgeous. The shade millennial is the perfect summer pink that isn't too bright. It feels so nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lipstick I've ever tried. I'm a sucker for nice lipstick and I have quite a collection. This lipstick immediately became my favorite, because it feels like there is nothing on your lips. It's so light weight, soft, sheer but can build up to a brighter color. I want to wear this every day and I want to get every single color. I highly recommend this lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The search is over for me for the ultimate MLBB lipstick! I don't know if it's the size or the lack of natural pigment in my lips but I feel like a lot of lipsticks look so weird on me. But this gives me a natural flush of color without looking super obvious or over the top. And the texture is just lovely and my sensitive lips haven't reacted at all to it! I think this will be a staple!

reviews.review_title: Best Lipstick for Rare Lipstick Wearers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a lipstick wearer, but this one is just so light-weight and natural that I can wear it every day. The product itself is great, but the lipstick holder inside of the packaging could be improved. Because it is so short and the product is so soft, the lipstick broke quite quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color, smells cheap and the lipstick fell out of the tube. It's somewhat streaky. I still like this brand.

reviews.review_title: Lives up the the hype - very universal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and normally just wear their lip oil. This feels as silky and light and a bit like a balm.  It's not cheap, but it's worth it.  I was surprised how luxurious the actual lipstick holder and case are.  It's very high-end.  This color is so universal - but I will say it has a touch more brown in it than pink. In the photo, I am wearing it with my Becca liner in weekend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color (slip) but my tube broke in the packaging after the first week, despite me not scrolling it up too high. Going to return and try a second tube and hope it doesn't happen again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this lipstick. Since I've bought it I've purchased two more shades. It's incredibly light weight so much so that i forget I'm even wearing lipstick. The coverage also lasts a really good amount of time. I highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product. I would compare this to Chanel in formula. The color was beautiful neutral for a fair skin tone. It may be too light for deeper complexions. Can't wait to add another color to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First thing I want to say is the packing is STUNNING and makes this lipstick feel much more expensive than it is. It is satisfyingly heavy in the hand but not bulky. The colored acrylic lid looks much nicer to me than just clear acrylic and they style of the case is just not something you see often which definitely makes this feel special and unique. Now on to the colors, feel and wear. I have 2 colors: Slip and Baby.  Slip is a lovely neutral leaning warm soft brown. Because of the formula and how thin it is, I can get the desired opacity without going overboard. I have light to light-med neutral/warm olive undertones with very pigmented lips which means browns, especially ones with a very heavy white base come off odd looking and too stark. Even with lip liner you can still see where my lip color is around the edges and it makes them look sickly or like there is a rash. Because this formula starts very sheer and can be built easily, I don't have that issue. And it's emollient so there isn't a lot of tug when applying and doesn't feel heavy when you build it up. And growing up in the late 90s/early 00s, it lets me relive that love of brown-neutral lips. It very much reminds me of  the long discontinued Bonne Bell lip gloss in Cappuccino, just warmer and thinner. Baby is a neutral pink with some beautiful dusty rose mixed in. After some swatching and comparing, it isn't EXACT as Merit is a bit deeper and the finish isn't matte, it is a very close dupe to CT Pillow Talk. And while I love CT, it is a heavier formula and a matte finish which has its time and place but I'm finding I prefer shiny, glossy, hydrating lip products more than anything that is matte. You definitely do not need both but I am not mad I have them both. I did deduct 1 star because Slip is not staying upright in the bullet. I'm not sure if it is due to melting a bit in transit or just the softness of the shade, but it is frustrating. Gonna try letting it fully set in the freezer and hope that helps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect color, the perfect texture, the perfect even lip stain left behind. Why then, am I only giving this product two stars? Because two of the three colors I bought, 1990 and Slip, have broken inside their packaging. I have been an avid lipstick wearer for years, and this has never happened to me. Perhaps it's due to the balmy nature of the lipstick. However, that then defeats the purpose of something you can reapply on the go. The packaging is beautiful and sturdy. Apparently, the lipstick bullet itself it not. It is really, really a shame, as the formula and the colors are unique and beautiful. Maybe I just had bad luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I really like the color but the formula and translucency were a deal breaker for me. This reminded me of a drug store lipstick which for $26 is way too pricey for that. It takes several layers to build up color that was visible on my lips and felt drying. I have several other lipsticks I prefer much more and decided to return this one. If you don't mind a strong vanilla scent and a drier lipstick that is very faint maybe you'll like it. I prefer Huda Beauty cream lipsticks or Charlotte Tilbury more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3 shades: Baby, 90s, and L'avenue. My skin is pale (alabaster in Bobbi Brown) and products tend to pull too pink on me. Baby doesn't. It's a true dusty pinkish (emphasis on the u201cishu201d) nude, it goes on smoothly and doesn't feel drying. Staying power could be better but I like that it's balmy and subtle, but buildable. I prefer products that are more translucent. This is not an opaque lipsticku2014but it isn't supposed to be.   Baby is great for everyday, and when you want to make an eyeshadow look the center.   90s: it's brownish! I like it. Not sure what else to say! It doesn't run too cool imo, so there's not a risk of looking gray-ish. But not too dark on me, and works for a neutral look. It's buildable, too, but starts off sheer (a plus in my book). Good for a little bit of an edgy vibe.   L'avenue: reminds me a bit of an old urban decay shade called bruise, but this one is more muted and brown-based (bruise was more berry). This one is to me a more mature, classic shade (versus the urban decay anyway), which I love. Subtle yet distinctive. Great for eveningsu2014though each of these shades could really work for any occasion, I tried to capture what I think the u201cvibeu201d felt like.   Main pros: wearable, buildable, versatile shades. Love the colors in this collection. Fresh yet classic!!!, balmy/not drying, comfortable, and did I mention it has beautiful packagingu2026so gorgeous.   Main cons: not long lasting

reviews.review_title: One of the only lipsticks I don't hate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous finish, obsessed. I now have 3: Slip, Cabo, and finally just got my hands on Baby. It's the perfect every day finish. Baby is practically identical to Pillow Talk FYI, I was curious about this so I just swatched them. In the pic, the top skinnier swatch is Baby and bottom thicker swatch is CT Pillow Talk lipstick. I love Cabo for going it, it's literally the perfect sort of 90s-ish red-orange. And Slip is a beautiful neutral that I also love for dinner or nighttime for a trendier/edgier look. Baby will be my go-to daytime/work lip now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Baby online based on the images (love that they show different skin tones!) and am disappointed that the color was soooo different on me than on the model. My colouring is similar to the Asian model, but the color was very chalky and had a white cast on me. So different than on the model. On any of the models! I imagine it would be beautiful on someone pale.   Formulation was ok! Comfortable and lightweight but I prefer a bit more moisture as this settled into my lip lines - maybe amplified because of the pale color on me? I might try another color and give this one more chance as I love the brand messaging. If you can find the right color this may be a good pick.

reviews.review_title: My Lips But Better Shades That Are Lightweight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think that this is a great lipstick to just throw on when you feel like you need a bit of color added to your lips. I wouldn't necessarily say that it's long-lasting, but I personally don't mind reapplying as needed when it comes to lip products. I have the shades Slip and Millenial and I absoliutely love both, but want to mention that Slip is the perfect neutral (brown-leaning) lip color. The color is definitely buildable with these and the overall consistency of this is definitely lightweight. I also need to comment on the packaging-- it's absolutely gorgeous AND it's so easy to find in your purse because of its unique shape.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and feels so nice on. It is sheer and build able. However, it has no staying power what so ever. I had to reapply at least 10 times in one night. I had to return it because it wouldn't even last through one drink even while using a straw. I wish it stayed better because it's so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade Slip, it's the perfect warm nude for my skin tone! I'm sad though because I've only applied it twice at my vanity, haven't taken it out of the house, and the bullet broke off the base. It wasn't overly hot in the room. Merit please fix this issue and release more nudes and I'd definitely buy more! The formula is creamy but dries to a slightly satin finish. Some people might not like the smell but I enjoy the kind of kids makeup/playdoh ish scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so pretty and so light on the lips! For as dark of a shade it faded nicely and was a breeze to wear. This is not a long wearing lip, but it's an amazing formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this lipstick with my entire heart! It's so easy to apply, it is also very moisturizing and looks beautiful! worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Brings a very natural, subtle tint to the lips. I would 10/10 recommend. Sad that this item sells out quick, get it while you can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect sheer liptick.  The formula is even better than the Gucci Sheer Lipsticks.  I absolutely adore this shade too!  It's a beautiful cool-toned 90's brown, but is super wearable because it is a sheer formula - so it doesn't look jarring at all.  It is just gorgeous.   I actually really like the packaging of these too.  I hope they come out with even more interesting shades.

reviews.review_title: Such a good lipstick it's worth the bad hardware
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best lipsticks I've ever used in terms of look (perfect, natural shine, sheer but buildable) and also feel (smooth and not sticky, stays on pretty well), but I had to return my first tube because it broke off at the bottom and it looks like my second tube is doing the same thing. I'm not winding it up too high, but it's doing it anyways. Genuinely worth it despite this, it's a great lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Won't dry out your lips, goes on smooooooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and feel of this lipstick! Balmy without being a sticky gloss. Application is perfect. Just bummed I didn't pick up Baby when I had the chance for a neutral every day. Fashion is a great dressed up berry color. If you stress about lipsticks drying you out, definitely pick one of these up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous! I love this shade. It also has lovely packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this color because of the negative reviews saying it wasnt the color depicted online. Online it looks like a bright springtime pink, but reviewers were sating it was more red based. I disagree about the red undertone. Its a true pink, but muted in a mature way. This is the first pink lipstick i actually like. Its not a fake, bright pink. It looks like my lips but healthier. The picture is it paired with Charlotte Tilbury iconic nude lip liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm utterly in love with this formula, so much so that I'm giving away other lipsticks in my collection to make sure I use these up I have Slip and Fashion (in pic) and it is such a stunning colour. Can't wait to create more looks and use this beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the merit lipsticks! Found my holy grail color in millenial

reviews.review_title: Millennial: peachy-rose-pink with a nice texture.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a Wonderful balmy texture (due to Sunflower oil?) with a sheer tone that melds with one's lipcolor. As others have noted, these MERIT l.s. are mostly warm-toned, so it's best to swatch in-person. Millennial is very similar to Baby: both look quite peachy-pink on my arm; Baby is warmer toned. But on my lips, Millennial is a warm peachy-rose. It's ok, but not as nice as Fashion -this range's sole cool shade. Merit, please release a few more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got slip and I love it. The perfect brown shade. And really smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite lipstick!  I ordered L'Avenue because Tiger is out-of-stock.  I'm 100% happy and impressed!  The texture is so comfortable.  Applies smoothly without any lipliner needed. Color is gorgeous - it makes my teeth look so white!  The packaging is high end, luxurious.  I am tempted to buy a backup in the same color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the color in pictures ans swatches,i bought it from the store.The consistency of the lipstick was just weird and it left patches and even small bits on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipstick!  The perfect summer tan wash of color.  Not the type you wear with lipliner.. more of an all day natural lip.  Love it!

reviews.review_title: Subtle warm honey-almond brown tone that creates s
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Subtle warm honey-almond brown tone that creates supple lips. It's sheer and buildable but really covers your lips nicely for a sensual lucious look and feel to your lips.   I find a lot of sheer lip colours to feel a bit more like an oil, so when outlining your lips it creates streaks of colour. Merit Signature Lip is the opposite.   This formula is sheer but covers your entire lip with even colour. Lasts long and is relatively hydrating.  i have dark brown features and fair-warm skin and Slip is the perfect every-day look that has that light tone that matches warm tone makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is the first bullet-type lipstick I've fallen in love with in years. I got the shade slip and baby and I want to get the entire line. The packaging is absolutely beautiful and looks very luxurious and feels heavy. The lipstick itself is so comfortable for everyday wear. It is a bit on the sheer side so if you want a full opacity lip color this may not be for you but I find I can get great coverage with this lipstick. The shade Baby is soo beautiful its like the perfect universal neutral rosy pink, and that's coming from someone who hates pink lipstick. Slip is a gorgeous neutral lipstick. I love this line im really impressed with this formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this lipstick! It glides on super smoothly without powdery feel and does not emphasize any lines or wrinkles in the lip. I took a star off for the color, millenial to me is more a muted red bean shade, it does not have any pink on my light-medium color lips, if you have a darker natural lip color this might come across more pink but even compared to the colors shown on the models, the lipstick leans more red bean undertone than pink. Packaging is beautiful and feels expensive. Would recommend this formula and lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful formula! So comfortable to wear and gives a sheer coverage that can be build up. I got this in Slip at first but it was exactly the same color as my lips so I couldn't really tell how it looked. Then I got this in Tiger and I'm in love. It's a such a lovely brick red color that goes on sheer so it's nothing like the other brick red I own in my collection. I'm definitely going to be grabbing more shades in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a great colour. I blind bought this and I have no regrets. There's it's very hydrating on your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite lipstick love how natural and buildabls it is and it does not look heavy on the lips. Will be buying more shade in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new go-to lipstick. The shade is a u201cmy lips but betteru201d colour. Needs to be reapplied throughout the day but I don't mind. I don't find any dryness at all like some reviews mention, I find it rather hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. Minus one star because it's a teeny bit drying on its own, but I've been pairing it with the tinted lip oil in Taupe and it's better that way. Some reviews have mentioned the scent of it, personally I think it unlocks some sort of core memory for me, so I'm into it. But yes, there is a wee bit of a fragrance if you're sensitive to that. Very similar colour to CT Pillow Talk, but with a satin-y finish. Lovely packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Baby is a nice neutral colour and the packaging is cute. Staying power is pretty good. The lipstick itself is a bit drying and the smell is rather unpleasant - like cheap dollarstore makeup. I'll probably keep using it because I like the colour but it's just okay to me. Won't buy another or necessarily recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like feel of this lipstick. It feels and goes on like a chapstick so it comes off easy like one, which may be an issue if you're wearing mask. I got this lipstick in the color fashion, which shoes up a bit more red my pink naturally pink bottom lip than I like but the color shows up well. I wish it was a tab but deeper in color I guess. But I'll keep it because I like the feel of the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color cabo is so good and a perfect orange-red, but like a few other reviewers said, the stick completely broke after the first time using it. It had moved all over the tube and then completely broke off making it unusable - had never been in a warm environment either and I feel too weird returning a lipstick that looks like it's been used for years. I don't know if this was a bad batch or if the square tube is too loose for the formula, but I hope Merit corrects it because this could be a go-to color if the packaging worked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color pay off isn't great, it didn't show up on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful, but I wish the formula was more hydrating. It applied almost patchy, and made my lips look dry and shriveled almost?! Tried it over lip balm, no luck. Tried under gloss, it still looked dry under the gloss, if that makes sense. To be clear, my lips were properly moisturized & looked moisturized before applying.

reviews.review_title: They smell like they're going bad out of the box
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this lipstick (I bought 3 shades!) but I can't get over the scent. It has that 'bad lipstick' scent which makes me feel like it's going to go bad the next time I open it and the scent is SO STRONG. It instantly turns me off the product and makes me feel like I shouldn't be using it.  The texture and application is nice.  The shades are nice, but they are super sheer - you'd probably have to apply a few layers to get to the colour intensity in the promo pics.

reviews.review_title: I could live happy with Tiger as my only lipstick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiger is the most amazing yellow toned red lipstick. It looks exactly like those Pinterest pictures of girls with u201cnaturally red lipsu201d like you've been kissing or biting your lips. I love to apply it with a detailing eye brush used as a lip brush and diffuse it across the lips. Perfect, sheered out slightly moisturized lip. Not a ton of hydration and it can get drying after days of wear, so no benefits on that end, but if you hydrate your lips beforehand you should be good.

reviews.review_title: Same colour as CT Pillow Talk w/Better Formula!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up in store today.  If you like the Charlotte Tilbury Superstar lips lipstick in the colour Pillow Talk, you will LOVE this shade in this formula.  The shade and finish are exactly the same swatched beside each other except when on the lips, the Merit feels lighter and more comfortable and is longer lasting than the Charlotte Tilbury.  PLUS, the price point is WAY BETTER with the Merit.  You get more than double the product for $7 CAD LESS than the Charlotte Tilbury.  Highly recommend this formula of lipstick for those who don't normally like wearing bullet lipsticks.  This formula is truly special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful formula and beautiful u201cyour lips but betteru201d shade. It's not too pink and not too brown. The formula is buttery and kind of in between and matte and satin. I can't wait to get some more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't normally love how lipstick looks on me. I tend to avoid it, however my wedding is this fall and I saw a gal on Instagram use this color and I loved how natural it looked. I absolutely love this product. It feels so smooth like chapstick and doesn't have that thick heavy lipstick feeling. It is NOT full coverage! Which is why I personally love it, but if you're looking for a thick full coverage color, this is not the product for you! I will definitely be wearing this for day to day looks/at my wedding and be repurchasing in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I'm writing this review after using this lipstick only a few times. I would say I have worn it under 10 times and I'm SO sad right now. But my beautiful lipstick is SO fragile. I don't even want to use it anymore because I'm scared the product will completely fall out. The third or fourth time I used it, it felt like it was moving a bit, even though I was quite gentle. I have a few other lipsticks from other brands like Nars (even some drugstore lipsticks) and I have never had this problem. If this lipstick did not move around and smudge the wall of the tube I would give it 5 stars. I am in love with everything about it, the formula, the scent, the packaging, and especially the colour. I'm not sure what to do because I can't even return it for a new one. I waited a couple of weeks to try it out and then I only wore it a few times since getting it, so it's past the return date. I saw one other review saying something similar so maybe it's a bad batch? I don't know. I am considering using a lip brush but it just makes things more complicated. I want to be able to just throw this in my bag and go somewhere. Also, I should mention, that I never had it in any kind of heated area or sunlight. I keep it in my drawer and my room is on the cooler side. Does anyone know if there's a way to fix this? Is this happening to others as well or just me and that one other person? I really wanted to buy another colour but if it's going to be the same then I won't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything from this lipstick : the formula, the smell, the colour, the way it wears off, the durability... Everything. It has been a while since I have loved a lip product so much and I intend to order it in several other colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty shade.  It is feels lightweight and nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased 4 Merit lipsticks and I am currently enjoying them. They only problem is that they don't last longer than an hour. I am okay with that as I enjoy the balm texture of this product. I think the colors are stunning for people with richer skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am soo obsessed with this color and formula, but unfortunately after 2 uses the whole lipstick broke off and is like mush :((( I love this color so I'm so upset

reviews.review_title: really nice but maybe too too soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I lloved the color, the texture, how it stays on the lips...but it broke the second day i used it. I was very careful when aplying it to my lips but the bullet still broke and i now have to use it with a brush. inconvenient....yes but I still love the formula

reviews.review_title: Subtle, gorgeous coloru2014 SOFT balm broke easily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, sheer color. But this stick was so soft, it broke twice while using it. It first wasn't attached properly and then the top half literally slipped off causing it too look like a mush stick :(. I only use it for a week and am considering next steps. Hopefully this was just a bad batch! It also does not last as long which is forgivable if I could swipe it on easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've gotten really good at picking out lipsticks online based on official swatches and descriptions, yet I picked a few 'fails' with this one. Millennial is what I pictured Baby would look on me, and Cabo is not as 'soft' as I imagined it to be based on the description. One of my favourite shades, Slip, came slightly broken and cannot be closed easily. It doesn't affect the usage, just disappointing. Despite all that, I still really like the formula. I've been wearing Slip and Tiger quite a lot since I've received it and would totally purchase more shades if they ever extend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for the colour Slip for years. Lightweight and soft, I can barely tell I'm wearing it. Perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have had brownish lipsticks in the past but everything seems to pull incredibly warm against my skin tone as i am pretty cool toned. this one does not do that!!  from the second this product glided on to my lips it felt smooth and buttery. it made my lips look plush-like and as if i had no lines in them. absolutely beautiful. wonderful. miraculous.  once the shade u2018baby' comes back in stock i will definitely be making another purchase and possibly a couple more shades! i can see this being the only lipstick i wear from now on. i hate the feel of traditional lipsticks and this genuinely feels as though there is nothing on my lips!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing, near natural shade. It lasted just over 6 hours without fading. Did not dry out at all. I love everything about this lipstick. No complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfection. It has slip and is lightweight but has beautiful pigment. It's not full on full coverage, it's one of those beautiful lipsticks that will go with everything and you can slap it on without a mirror with no worries.  I can see myself getting more colours for sure. I don't mind scent but rest assured there is no strong scent for any of those that are bothered by that sort of thing. It feels luxurious and of high quality. The look of the packaging is beautiful too, however i find it just a tad bit bulky. Overall I love it and that says a lot because I have tons and tons of high end lipsticks. I have been reaching for this daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never posted a review, but this is now my most favorite lip product! The texture is so comfortable, even wearing a bright shade is not intimidating. You do need to put on a few layers to get more tint but it's okay, I found that there's no need to be super precise. Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty and pigmented. Good amount of shine without being to shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. It's a lipstick but somehow also a stain. It's pretty impressive, the formula, the color the packaging. I want all the colors now bye bye, bank account.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why there's so much hype around this. People saying it's the most comfortable lipstick ever. I tried it, it literally just feels like any other lipstick with a satin finish. The packaging is gorgeous but I might return them, I'm not wowed by these. They don't feel hydrating or anything so idk what everyone is on about. Don't bother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this lipstick!!! It really is lightweight but still gives off a beautiful color. It feels hydrating. The packaging feels super fancy too. Lol. This is my new favorite lip stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Broke at the base immediately upon first application. Color is beautiful but not noticeably moisturizing. I wanted this so badly but Probably returning bc it's BUSTED.

reviews.review_title: The Colors are Different in Person
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My Sephora store didn't carry this in the color I wanted so I had to Order it online and... Frankly if I would have seen it in person before buying it I wouldn't have bought it at all. Millennial is supposed to be a classic pink but it's actually a medium warm rose, nothing close as described or shone in the pictures. It's not a bad color, but it's not what I'm looking for. I tried it out anyway because I heard good things about the formula and the formula is lovely, very reminiscent of the Crushed Lip Colors. My lips can get pretty dry and textured because I have pernicious anemia. It made my lips feel dry but not as much as other lipsticks have and the pigment didn't sink into lines or emphasize dry patches and it feels nice to put on. If they ever come out with more colors and stock them in the store I'll definitely consider trying it again, but from the 3 I was able to see in person and the one I ordered they all lean very warm and rusty or rosy. If you can, swatch them in store first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this lipstick. Incredibly comfortable to wear and I'm a big fan of the shades. Since trying Slip I've ordered 3 more shades and will probably wear them daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased L'AVENUE, and FASHION.. I love them both equally! The formula is nice and light so you can build up for more color, or just dab it on for a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I exchanged a CT lipstick for this one because the matte formula is too dry for me. this is like a fancy lip balm. the packaging is beautiful, it has no smell, is clean, and comes in gorgeous colors. i got l'avenue and it's a warm brown/red, comparable to CT so 90s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This functions like a buildable, sheer tinted lip balm but is much much lighter on your lip, which is exactly what I needed. I don't think it is as pigmented as the reference photos, maybe if you put on multiple layers. But it's great for that subtle enhancement of your lips. The brick red color of tiger is to die for.  of course, because of the nature of this product, it gets wiped off easily which is my only issue with it. But it's okay.

reviews.review_title: Sadly these are a pass for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is nice, packaging is ok (bulky and actually kinda cheap feeling). Overall I was not a fan of the texture of this product. It feels almost heavy and the color payoff is sheer. Of course, I understand this is the look that is intended; however, I was expecting a lighter formula. Somehow with natural formulas my lips get an odd reaction and don't love them. Same goes for this one. Popular opinion is positive for this product, but for me it's a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't show up on deeper skin tones. Comfortable wear but my lip gloss was carrying the look, not the lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Please excuse the dry skin, but I needed to show off this lipstick! It feels so smooth and has great pigment. The only downside now is I have to buy all of the other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous color especially on dark skin tones. This is literally a perfect lipstick especially for a makeup no makeup or clean girl look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely formula. The packaging is also very lux. My issue is with the shade options. I wish they were a bit less brown. I picked up Baby but I wish I would have gone with Millennial instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I put it on it instantly became my favourite lipstick! It's so flattering! I will say though that the colour looks a little different in person than online but I ended up liking it more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love the lipstick packaging. Top and tube snap together magnetically. To be honest I feel like the pictures didn't represent someone with my skin tone and I say I'm disappointed these don't look anything like the picture. Tried to like them but they caused a reaction on my lips, unfortunately have to return. Even though the lipsticks didn't work out I look forward to trying other products in the Merit line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. I have two shades and both are amazing! So hydrating and I love that! I don't think they are the most long lasting however I think they are great for a hydrating lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color Slip looks so beautiful in other people's reviews/photo, but on me, it looked like that sort of 90s-era vampy/grunge look (light to medium skin tone). I like that it's a clean formula, but otherwise, I didn't love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO beautiful! I'm not a lipstick girl but I have been wearing this every day. Also looks great with my olive skintone, which can be a little tricky with pinks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Elegant packaging that is better than some luxury brands.  Colour payoff is great. Rather moisturizing.  Does what many other products do, but it's is clean and is presented in a upscale design.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: pigment isn't really there but it's a gorgeous, easy no makeup don't even have to look when applying kind of lipstick. I bought shade u201cslipu201d & want to purchase u201c1990u201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit skeptical at first wondering if the colour will show up on my pigmented lips and if it will work with my skin tone. It absolutely does, such creamy formula and so lightweight. The colour pay off was good and I found a true nude for me. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly was expecting something better for the hype. It's not a terrible product but I found it very drying and it has that cheap crayon smell that drugstore lipsticks have. For the price I was expecting a very hydrating, long lasting lip. I got the colors Slip and Tiger and I think I'll be returning Slip as it takes quite a bit of swipes to get a good color and doesn't preform well.. Tiger is gorgeous though. 3/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color you can build up but looks great with one swipe.  Not drying at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so pretty and natural. I pair this with my refy rosewood lip sculpt a lot so it keeps the lipstick from budging. It's very smooth and goes on well. It is a shiny finish, so not quite matte or satin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this product. Originally, I wanted to purchase this because of the packaging - I wasn't super in love with any of the shades when I saw them online, but I was in store and just so happened to swatch Millennial. Its the perfect wearable pink, very fitting for spring/summer especially! The formula is creamy and sheer upon first application but a couple layers can make it more opaque. I haven't been a lipstick wearer in years, but this product has made its way into my daily rotation already. I will definitely be picking up more shades.  Note: A lot of people say there is a big color difference between online and in-person... yes and no? I think online they seem very flat(?). Much more color and sheen almost irl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is great! It is creamy and easy to apply. This color is perfect and is really a your lips but better color on me. It is a very neutral and natural-looking pink. It looks great with my pale skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so balmy and comfortable. Also love that you can wear it more sheer or build up the color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my go-to lipstick. The shine isn't overpowering and the colors are extremely subtle. Very comfortable to wear with hydration for the lips. It doesn't showcase my cracked lips at all. The packaging is luxurious as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!! Very hydrating and goes on like a balm. Color isn't overwhelming and it's easy to build up. Love the way it feels on!!

reviews.review_title: Patchy and not as pigmented as in brand photos
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a 90s brown, but this was just a little more cool-toned than it looked in the photos. Disappointing. Also way more sheer than I was expecting, based on the brand photos. It's not buildable either. If your lips are not already perfectly smooth and uniform in texture, this will look patchy, although maybe this is not a problem with the lighter shades. It is lightweight and somewhat moisturizing. Still trying to decide if I'll return it, hoping a lip liner will help.

reviews.review_title: I don't understand the hype. It's so dry.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this very drying. I couldn't wait to wipe it off. The bulky plastic packaging feels cheap. There's no click when I put the tube back into the case. It feels like it would slide out if I put it in my purse. I rarely return things to Sephora, but this is going back.

reviews.review_title: Baby and Slip: my new obsessions
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I was skeptical about the hype surrounding these lippies. I've always been a person who very much prefers the *idea* of lipstick over the reality of wearing it (lol) but these are a real game changer for me.  The formula feels like literal silk, absolutely divine. They weren't kidding about the weightless part, it's seriously wild.   The shade Baby is a p e r f e c t match to my natural lip color,  which I honestly wasn't expecting (it appears just a bit more pink on me than in the photos, I was hoping for slightly warmer/less pink) but I am obviously thrilled to have found! My lips can be a bit pale/patchy in color, so this is a huuuge win for me. A very happy accident!  Slip is just freaking gorgeous. My usual go-to nude is Mac's HoneyLove, but the formula on these lipsticks make them just so easy to apply (especially versus Mac's matte formula which takes a bit of care in application), this one is going into heavy rotation for SURE.   I also just slid over to Merit's website to nab Tiger (currently out of stock here) so I think it's safe to say I'm a fan and if they ever go out of business or stop making these I will personally riot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a very natural looking lipstick. The color millennial is the perfect everyday pink. I took one star off because the lid is hard to remove at first.

reviews.review_title: Good balance of light lip feel and pigment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like nothing on the lip and well  -pigmented u2014 more than you'd think with such a light feel. Buildable so can be light with one swipe or bolder with more swipes. I get compliments all the time. I love a coral/red-orange lip so have quite a few across brands but this one is my new holy grail lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very light almost sheer for tan-medium skin. You can barely tell you have it on. I wish for a product that had better pigmentation and possibly did not wipe off so easily. Good for kissing a significant other as you can barely tell any difference. Not worth it in my opinion.
