reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I think this is a nice lipstick. It has a soft, satin finish and is comfortable to wear. It's not the longest lasting, but that's to be expected. I do agree with some other comments that the packaging is bulky and uses more plastic than necessary. I have two shades, Baby and Slip, and I will say that I'm finding the colors more tricky to work with than I expected for neutral tones. They both have more of a brown undertone, and almost look cool-toned on me (I have a neutral/warm skin tone and usually wear warm shades). I'm just struggling to find a makeup look that really goes with these shades well. For a comparison, Baby reminds me a lot of Mac Modesty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a lipstick girl, but this has changed me. I always have issues with lipsticks drying out my lips but this doesn't. The color is beautiful and so natural. I'll be purchasing more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're trying to decide between Rose Inc. and Merit, it's this one hands down.  I purchased the color Baby and liked so much that I bought 2 more colors, Slip, and Millennial .  Which is unusual for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really glad I purchased this. It's very lightweight like a chapstick but has the same staying power as a lipstick. The color baby is a gorgeous neutral shade only slightly darker than my lip color and I have neutral light skin. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color I bought is Tiger, but the color difference between the real object and the picture is too big. If I do not go to the counter to try the color, I will not buy other products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a hydrating lipstick. I had to put on lipgloss over the top after an hour or two because it got so drying. I thought this was going to be a more balmy, perfect for summer lipstick. The shade is very unique, which is why I'm keeping it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I own this product in multiple colors but wanted to write about Slip. I normally gravitate away from beige shades like this because they wash me out but this is perfect and has a nice neutral, my lips but better. They are super comfortable on the lip and feel like a moisturizing balm. While they are sheer, they are also fairly buildable. The colors are just so incredibly curated and I know every single shade will look good on every skintone. So elevated and classy on the lips. 10/10 this is my holy grail lipstick now.

reviews.review_title: Lipstick Junkies should check this one out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The feel of this lipstick is really nice, as described lightweight, but that doesn't mean no wear either. It does stick around reasonably well. My only complaint is the smell when you first put it on, not quite sure what it is, but I don't really care for it. Seems to dissipate quickly though. Case is really nice (picture doesn't do it justice), but that isn't a selling factor for me personally. While they don't have many color options, I did find Millenial and Fashion to be very wearable options.

reviews.review_title: Nice colour but the formula is lacking
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this lipstick difficult to apply for something that is supposed to be balmy. I tried it for a second time after a full night of wearing a lip mask so my lips were well moisturized, but it still dragged, was patchy, settled in cracks, and seemed like it instantly dried out my lips. I am happy to sacrifice colour payoff for moisture and smoothing properties, but this had neither.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color, it's really a MLBB shade for me. It is smooth and creamy, and opaque. For some reason I was expecting it to be a little sheer, not fully opaque. My only issue is it brings out lines in my lips that I didn't know I had. I'm only 26. I only took off 1 star because I'm still going to buy other shades because I think it's such a beautiful line & I'll probably wear a gloss over it to smooth out my lips, but if you have fine lines in your lips and they bother you this probably isn't the formula for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Soft and silky on the lips has lots  of moisture only thing missy is the color . If you want a lipstick that hydrating with little to no color this is a hood option .

reviews.review_title: Baby is a great neutral lip for darker skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a lipstick fan usually but this product is super lightweight, moisturizing and fairly pigmented but also buildable. Baby applies more like a nude colour with pinkish undertones that is a great everyday lip colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SUCH a gorgeous colour that works on so many skin tones! (including mine, which is light-medium skin) Very comfortable on the lips, lightweight balmy texture with a perfect amount of colour payoff. It does provide some hydration but I find when it's wearing off over time my lips don't feel super hydrated, however they don't feel overly dry. Perfect to pop on with a full glam look or a more natural daily look. I would pair it with a lip liner for extra coverage and longer wear but, I think it looks great without a lip liner and doesn't feather from the lips from what I've experienced wearing it so far. Overall LOOOVE this product and formula and will definitely buy more of the colour range!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so skeptical since most reviews I've seen were from gifted/sponsored but this lipstick surpassed my expectations. It starts out as a sheer wash of colour but builds in opacity. Love that my natural lip colour peeks through. I have fairly dark pigmented lips and I cannot get enough of the shade against my olive-tan complexion. Will be picking up Baby next!

reviews.review_title: If you have lip sensitivity, watch out.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I own Tiger (bought through the manufacturer's website) and L'Avenue (bought at Sephora). I find both of these colours to be unusual and sophisticated in a late 1990's minimalist way. The sheer colour pay-off suits me perfectly, although it's not for everyone. So far so good. However, I'm finding that both of these shades make my lips tingle and then eventually peel. I don't experience this with any other lipsticks and can only name the original Bite Beauty formula as having brought about the same reaction. So, yay for the shades and application and the attractive and weighty packaging. Boo for the reaction. If you react to lip products, proceed with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is incredible and perfect. I love the sheerness and the buildability at the same time. It is so moisturizing, my lips feel soft long after it has worn off. I find that I'm not reapplying lip balm as much throughout the day because of this. The color has good enough longevity and it fades beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great lipstick! The formula goes on smoothly actually stays on for a long time. You can make it sheer or build it up for a more bold look. Cabo is the perfect marriage of orange and red without being too over the top. I usually stick to pink lipstick but wanted to find one cthat would pop with a tan- and this is it! I also got it in baby, which is a beautiful subtle pink. Love love love them and will buy more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the sheer color of this lipstick, I got Tiger and it adds a nice wash of color to my lips. Even though it's very emollient, it's not actually moisturizing. It feels like a cheap drugstore lipstick. The packaging is very clunky and uses way too much hard plastic, it seems unnecessarily wasteful. A total miss for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick so much, it is perfect for everyday wear. It's buildable so you can wear it sheer or more full coverage. A must try honestly!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super pale girl friendly shade, I love it! The formula is also really good and not super drying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Cabo and love it as the perfect orangey red that you can sheer out or build up. I then bought 1990 on a leap of faith. It looks a bit deeper than I wanted in the swatches and on the models, and I was worried that it would look vampy. But it is truly the perfect 1990s brown with neutral undertones. It is not as dark as it looks in the swatches, on the models, or by description. For reference, I have med/light skin (Fenty 210) and medium pigmented lips. It's just a touch darker than my natural lip color and looks on trend, and not vampy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the quality of the product, it is the most unique shade I have in my collection- it truly is a berry brown. I love the packaging, very lux and feels heavy. Sometimes if my lips are dry it does tend to accentuate the dryness- that can be fixed with a bit of lip balm so it's not a big issue.

reviews.review_title: Like the lip product, not the packaging.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the lightweight lipstick but not the heavy, bulky packaging. The lippie reminds me of the Gucci Sheer one with the rosebud cap. Comfortable blam-like texture that dosen't slide around. They both also blur lines/wrinkles on and around the lips. You can't really get a crisp outline but they are so easy to wear. I like this but the packaging is so big and I hate the thick plastic! I much prefer the slimmer shaped, luxurious Gucci component and also the tip on their bullet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SO SO SO NICE!!!! Its almost like a balm but better Delivers such a nice feeling on your lips, smooth buttery formula that makes your lips very soft Will buy more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for more pigment for this lovely looking shade but sorry to say it only provides a tint and a slight sheen. It does not show against my tanned Asian skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this lipstick but it didn't work for me. I have super dry lips so I'd need to layer this with something hydrating so it looks smooth on my lips. I really like the lip oil though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderfully light but with staying power. The color is also very flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly my favourite lipstick right now. Slip is such a nice mlbb colour and it compliments my skin tone so well. The texture feels like lip balm but with the tint of a lipstick. I use this with my Charlotte Tilbury lipliner and it is my go to lip combo. Definitely give this a try!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect every day lipstick! It is light and adds just the perfect amount of color. This will definitely be my go to this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging feels lux. The formula feels like a lipbalm. The colour fades evenly and leaves a pretty but subtle stain. Once faded, my lips don't feel dry. I am surprise at how light it feels on the lips for the pigment it can give. The shade Fashion is a true rasberry pink. I will inclure a picture of a sheer application and a more pigmented swipe and me wearing it. Just for reference, I am a fenty 120N or rare beauty 130N skin tone. Go try it , you won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found the perfect u201cmy lips but betteru201d shade! It glides on like a balm for a sheer look - keep going and you get a deeper colour that still looks natural! Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade slip is such a classic nude shade for Latina's. The packaging is very lux and the lipstick formula is unlike any other. Highly recommend putting in your bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love LOVE this lipstick. Before purchasing this, I didn't wear lipstick very often, only on special occasions and usually more of a statement color. This lipstick, however, has almost replaced my daily lip balm. The product doesn't go on heavy, so it looks quite natural and I forget I'm even wearing it. I also just adore this shade. I've had such a hard time finding a natural-looking lip shade that actually looks good on my warm-toned skin -- something that's not too beige, not too purple, not too pink. This is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite lipstick. Sheer, buildable, not too slippery and not too dry. Feels like a balm that is not slick in texture. Wears beautifully without a lipliner and easy to apply without a mirror. Getting every single color during the VIB sale!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the color and consistency. Looked beautiful on the lips, but it broke off at the base after the 3rd use. I worry about what would happen in hotter weather

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the pigment, color, feel & everything about it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color! Goes beautifully with the lip glosses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick of my dreams! I love the way this looks and feels on my lips. Will definitely be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick but this shade in particular is everything you could want! A great neutral shade that looks amazing on everyone. Not to mention the formula makes my lips feel moisturized and like I don't have anything more than a lip balm on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lipstick. It might be my favorite merit product yet. Smells great with a seamless and creamy application. My lips feel moisturized and the color is gorgeous. Highly recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lipstick definitely light weight on the lips. Need to reapply every 2-3 hours or it starts to clump. I think the color I got is beautiful and matches my skin tone well. The packaging is also unique, paired with nyx lip liner and it did give it more of a pop

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color is perfect for my olive skin tone. Formula is very buttery and wears well.

reviews.review_title: smooth and creamy - will order more shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product! I wanted to try Merit for a while now and I started from their new lipstick, highlighter and blush. All three products are AMAZING. The lipstick is smooth, soft, moisturizing and you can really layer the shade to make it pop more or less, depending on your mood. I wore it all day at work and it didn't dry my lips which is very unusual for me because I have very dry skin overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the most moisturizing lipstick I've ever had. It feels nice on and my lips feel better after having it on, but the color doesn't stay very long.

reviews.review_title: The PERFECT Work from Home Lipstick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I swear I have been trying to find this lipstick for years. Something lightweight & sheer enough for everyday that fades naturally over time and still gives a great pop of color. This lipstick is absolutely perfect for everyday and my new go-to. It perks me up for endless Zoom calls when I don't want to be applying & wearing tons of lip liner & lipstick. It's hydrating on the lips and feels really nice to wear. 10/10, I'm hooked and buying every color!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful lip formula! This is what I was hoping the Glossier ultralips would be! The formula is creamy and nourishing with good staying power in comparison to other balmy formulas. L'avenue pulls a very nice red on me -- a pleasant surprise. Looking forward to picking up another color or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful lipstick. It's super moisturizing and it lasts. I ate a whole messy burger with this on and it still looked great after on my lips. I only needed to reapply a tiny bit and I was set for the rest of the day. I'm gonna have to buy it in more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade and the feel of this lipstick. I tried it on in the store based on an employees suggestion and I left with one! L'Avenue is gorgeous. I don't usually wear lipstick and this one is nice and smooth and feels like a lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super comfortable, I love the colour and the finish. I don't love the scent/taste but that's minor!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: MERIT advertises this as a sheer lipstick and I am disappointed that I let myself fall into the brand hype. It definitely doesn't apply sheer, I'll start with that. The color payoff is decent, but it's so balmy and shiny that it takes quite a few swipes to actually get the color to fill right. It applies potently at the outer layers of the lips and then just struggles to get any legitimate color on the inner part of the lips. Then at the first sip/bite of anything, ANYTHING, it transfers immediately off the lips and on to the cups/utensils. Literally fades within seconds. So I guess that's what the sheerness refers to. Why did I pay $26 for a sheer lipstick??? It also claims that the ingredients are so hydrating the color will not settle into lines and accentuate them, but it certainly did for me. All in all, not a worthy purchase. I appreciate the low maintenance natural makeup movement, but this is just a way to take people's money. A tinted balm gives similar color payoff, but much better hydration and benefits for the lips, for much less money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade Baby!  I ordered a few items off of their website, because I wanted the cosmetic bag that comes free with first purchase.  This lip far exceeded my expectations for a creamy lipstick!  I actually had to wipe it off after a few hours before I ate because it was still on ( don't like lipstick on when eating )  Very flattering shade as well, I have medium skin tone, and this was pretty much my lips 'but better' look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this color looks like my natural lip color. It really just gave a slightly more flushed look, and I love it. Perfect for someone like me who doesn't like to see their color wear off, or have to keep reapplying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glides on smooth and has a nice rich color. It applies light, so you have to wear a lot to get the full color. However, that allows you to be versatile in how dark you want to wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always on the hunt these days for lip products that are easy to wear and give me that effortless model off duty look and I think this lipstick does that pretty well.   The shade I purchased, Slip is a warmer neutral brown that falls into the types of shades I typically like to wear. The name for this shade is pretty apt,as the formula itself has a very nice slip to it and it is pretty easy to put on even with minimal or no prep to the lips, but it's not so soft that the formula gets mushy or falls apart as I'm trying to use it. The formula is buildable, but I will say that it still imparts a pretty strong amount of color after a few swipes on (which I don't mind at all), so if you're looking for something more akin to a lip tint this isn't going to be that necessarily unless you choose to blot to tone down the color.  I like the way the formula feels on the lips fairly well, but seeing as my lips are perpetually dry I prefer to prep with a balm beforehand, although for this lipstick I keep that step to a minimum because I've noticed that sometimes it doesn't like to play with my balms very well if I've applied too much.   The component is VERY luxe, for the price I figure I'd be getting another, more expensive brand and it is a pleasure to use and display on my vanity.   Overall, I highly suggest this lippy if you're into products like Glossier Generation G, but you want something less matte, and easier to apply and easier to build. It's a win in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skeptical, but merit is on to something with these. The build ability is what makes these unique to me, I definitely don't have any other lip products like it. The packaging feels luxe and heavy.  My complaint so far is the color Tiger. It looked like it had more of an orange/terracotta undertone but it looks more brown than terracotta. I am thinking of getting Cabo to layer on top of tiger to brighten it up for my true spring coloring.
Love this color! These lipsticks have such a great consistency, leaving my lips feeling so hydrated! Super buildable too!
LOVE this shade! Such a pretty, warm color that goes so well with any look! Been wearing this one daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula feels nice but the pigment isn't great great on dark skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this nice neutral shade! Comes off easily which is annoying but overall not bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe a little too lightweight - the pigment is not that rich compared to my other brick red lipsticks. However, I do like the color, quite shimmering too, and it looks good for a everyday makeup look

reviews.review_title: MY PERFECT LIPSTICK FORMULA! I want all the shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick exceeded my expectations. I love the pop of spring pink in the shade MILLENIAL I purchased; perfect for spring! It's a very wearable, everyday classic pink to bring life to your complexion. I'm now eyeing 1990 as my next purchase. They have really done an excellent job curating all of the shades; each one desirable to a wide consumer base! The formula is so lightweight on the lips, I'd say a very comfortable satin, buidable from sheerish to fuller opacity. It's just the perfect lipstick, in my opinion. I have too many lipsticks to count, so I certainly wasn't looking to buy a new one, but the component and reviews drews me in and boy, it knocked my socks off. The component is weighty and luxurious- a departure for Merit. I even feel a bit glam pulling it out of my purse; not bad for such an affordable price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pinkish/purple lips that fair on the side of mauve. I have been looking EVERYWHERE for a semi-sheer lip product that would give me a more neutral tone to the lip but not look over lipsticked. I wanted an everyday u201cis that her lip Color and just some like balm or is it a lipstick?!u201d Kind of vibe. And this gives that and so much more. This lipstick will FOREVER be on my person from now on.

reviews.review_title: Love the formula, but not the colour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this lipstick is amazing like others have said - it's balmy, moisturizing, and lightweight. However, I don't like the shade Baby at all. It's a neutral/leaning towards cool-toned type of mauvy pink that has a gray undertone on my lips. More like a gray dusty rose shade, and defs not a neutral pink. I have warm undertones, so this just didn't make me look good. It darkens my complexion instead of brightening it lol. Maybe Millenial could've been a better choice for me. Overall I'd give it 4 stars, just one point off for the shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great reviews in here but didn't work for me. Not smooth enough or hydrating enough color wasn't anything special. I cannot see spending over 26.00 for this. I am returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely formula, so comfortable. Great for when you want something more elevated than a balm. Perfect amount of color. The shades are perfection! It's hard to find good brown-nudes, these are very modern. I don't love the upside down packaging but that doesn't make a difference.

reviews.review_title: If you liked the oils, you'll like these
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is something special about these lipsticks. Packaging aside, which is heavy, beautiful and lux, the formula is like a super pigmented lip balm. You can skip the lip liner. I got tiger and slip and the tones are something I have not seen before; they might look average but they are anything but. Somehow they look bold without being in your face and are super comfortable on the lips. Perfect for daytime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little dark shade the Baby but love the application of this lipstick. Doesn't flake or dry up my lips. Could definitely wear this everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved how smooth is applied and the color is perfect for an every day shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While 'Fashion' is not a cool Berry on me, it is a Good neutral and quiet Red. Its near-weightless feel- similar to Giv.le Rouge. Lucite case is a bit like l.s. Dior Addict and Giv.Interdit- surprised a 'green brand' would use such. Hope MERIT brings out true Cool ones. Overall, quite pleased with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipstick! I would like to warn you, it depends on your expectations. This is a light lipstick (meaning it does give a very heavy colour coverage on your lips), which is exactly what I was looking for - a very pleasant natural day to day lipstick I can wear. As it is very light it never dries up your lips and you can layer it to enhance the colour if preferred. It was a bit more neutral than expected but I actually fell in love with the shade, even told my friends it is not the lipstick shade I wanted but it was the lipstick shade I needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking forward to this neutral color, but there is no color after applying. Almost like using a clear, matte lip cream

reviews.review_title: It's fine, nothing to write home about.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's fine. The colour, though not described this way, was a bit orangier than expected. Goes on smooth, didn't notice it as particularly long wearing. Does feel weightless if that's your thing. I'll use it up by blending with another colour and won't buy again.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Packaging for a Beautiful Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating, buildable, and beautifully packaged. I'm not typically a lipstick girl but this wears just as comfortably as my go-to balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not usually a lipstick girl, but this wears so comfortably I feel like I could wear it all day. Lightweight, hydrating, and beautifully packaged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful and perfect for a natural look. And I love the look of the lipstick itself. I think it will become one of my go to lipstick for work. It's very moisturizing so might need to apply a couple of times to if you'd like a more obvious shade and I do think unlink the matte texture the pigment comes off quite easily when eating or drinking.  *I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a GREAT clean lipstick, which is hard to find. I don't find it to be as hydrating as I would like, but it's also a very thin formula, so having intense hydration is a bit hard. Finding a good berry lippie isn't easy, and this color is beautiful! It's very comfortable to wear. Definitely will buy more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's a warm pink color that has a little matte effect that just looks perfect for any occasion!!! Does not dry the lips, I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is amazing from start to finish. Gorgeous tube? Check. Color payoff? Incredible and customizable, straight off a 90's runway. Feel? Like silk on the lips, guys, I promise!! Get it, you will *not* regret it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off the packaging is Devine. Stunningly eye catching.   I got the color Baby, and I will probably buy like all of the colors haha. The formula is so hydrating and delicate. No crazy harsh smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best lipstick I have ever tried! Long lasting, creamy and such a beautiful color!

reviews.review_title: buy the shade u201cbabyu201d you won't regret it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought two shades on the bat (Baby& Tiger) I love the shade Baby so much, it's the perfect pink for my skin tone (I'm light+ slight yellow and pink undertone) I love it for an everyday shade because It's not too heavy. Tiger however, I was so excited, but the color is very sheer. Doesn't glide on easily like Baby. I love the shade tho, it's the perfect darkish warm red, but it's too sheer. Overall, I love this lipstick tho. The packaging, the smell, and it is also a u201ccleanu201d make up brand. I love Merit, can't wait to try more from them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The lipstick is just okay.  The color is okay but it broke within 2 days of receiving it.  Completely broke off the base like a cheap drugstore lipstick. For $26 US I expect more.  It's not even moisturizing enough to make sense that it would break so easily during winter so not even a heat issue affecting durability.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this brand. The color is beautiful and I adore the packaging! New fan for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this brand and shade! The packaging is gorgeous as well. Can't wait to get more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have olive skin and this didnt show up on my lips. I love brick reds so I was excited but it didnt really show up. It was sheer. It feels nice on though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE IT! it's super buildable and i like my lipsticks like that because sometimes just an opaque color is too much. it's soft on the lips and the finish is so pretty. def gonna try the other shades as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La texture est parfaite, ni trop cremeuse ou seche! Je peux appliquer plusieurs couches et l'effet reste naturel. L'odeur est egalement agreable. Definitivement, un must si vous cherchez un rouge u00e0 levre naturel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what i was expecting, but in a good way. It gives a really buildable color which i like. Sometimes i don't want my lipsticks being totally opaque. Also has a very natural finish, not shiny but not too matte. I think it's really great for those more natural days where you want a little color on your lips. Also the packaging is gorgeous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy way for me to dip into a browner more neutral toned color. Formula is great for someone who isn't really a lipstick girl. Will be trying other colors as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ooo the consistency on this! And it doesn't dry out my lips. My lips get chapped really easily an I hate the feeling of lipstick on my lips. This is an easy way to ease into lipstick for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always hated wearing lipstick because I've found it super drying on my lips. This lipstick changes the gameu2026u2026 I finally feel comfortable to wear lipstick out of the house and the neutral tones are soooo pretty. In love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only lipstick I have ever bought and liked. The colour is a perfect neutral and it feels good going on, not too dry. I will be trying out other colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the lipstick for those of us who love lipstick but can't wear them for long. It feels like the softest hug and the best thing is how buildable the color is. With most lipsticks I take a tissue and blot to get the look Merit gives me with one swipe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the prettiest lipstick I've ever bought, from the packaging to the application! I love this soft brown neutral color- not too bright, but adds the perfect touch for a night out. It also wears great but make sure to bring with you for any touch ups after eating especially! I will definitely be buying more colors!!! Hoping they come out with a matte line asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the prettiest lipstick I've ever bought, from the packaging to the application! I love this soft red color- not too bright, but adds the perfect touch for a night out. It also wears great but make sure to bring with you for any touch ups after eating especially! I will definitely be buying more colors!!! Hoping they come out with a matte line asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying Merit. My mom and i popped into a sephora and it was an impulse buy for me. but i love it! it's a great neutral shade for me, and gives it that Your-Lips-But-Better look. it's super creamy and buildable. the only thing that could improve is lasting power. i needed to reapply basically on the hour. but it made my lips look so plump and healthy that i don't mind! i have fair skin with cool undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so pretty & feels like chapstick !!  as someone who HATES the feel of any makeup on my skin this is the product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these lipsticks! Super soft and pigmented. This color is the perfect my lips shade for my super pale and pink skin. Got Cabo also, which is a great burnt orange red!

reviews.review_title: Tiger - Such a beautiful color + hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating formula and buildable! I love to use this product on my lips, cheeks and even my eyelids, if you have 5 minutes to get ready for a night out this is a really lovely color to play with. The only downside to this lip is that it can apply a little bit blotchy? Could be just me and the dryness of winter so I definitely prime my lips before applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful red/orange pigment. I feel it is a summer vibe for me. I also have and am enjoying the shade u201cTigeru201d. I find that the Cabo is much more pigmented than Tiger. Very hydrating formula and buildable! My number one thing I look for in lip products is that it is organic and natural ingredients since it is quite literally going on my lips and possibly in my mouth.

reviews.review_title: 1990 : It's a Mood and I'm feeling Moody
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a two toned lip, so 1990 looks great on my darker toned areas.  This lipstick smells really great and has a very light application; very creamy and moisturizing; great for a busy mom like me. The picture makes this lipstick look darker than it really is; in person it's more of a true chocolate brown.  Great product overall. I'm African American and I have a two toned lip which can get challenging to dress sometimes, and I can wear this color 1990.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: By itself, the texture/formula of these lipsticks is five stars; silky, balmy, and remarkably moisturizing. The color payoff is quite sheer, but buildable if desired. By no means are you going to get a pigmented lip out of the experience, but that's not exactly Merit's branding anyway. I knocked off a star because this feels more like a lip-tint rather than a lipstick on my complexion (medium/deep). Actually, I'd probably give u201c1990u201d 3.5 stars because it looks a bit gray on me.  *I received this products in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: By itself, the texture/formula of these lipsticks is five stars; silky, balmy, and remarkably moisturizing. The color payoff is quite sheer, but buildable if desired. By no means are you going to get a pigmented lip out of the experience, but that's not exactly Merit's branding anyway. I knocked off a star because this feels more like a lip-tint rather than a lipstick on my complexion (medium/deep).   *I received this products in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wish this product packed a little more punch on the opacity of the colors. You'd have to swatch 1990 so many times to even remotely get the color in the photos. If this was a regular lipstick, I think i'd keep. But if you have naturally very pink lips to begin with, it won't show through the same.   Three stars mainly for the packaging, including the box. It feels so luxurious I almost wanted to keep it just for that. The product just didn't work for me, but I can see it working for many others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting an orange/red lipstick shade for a while and this one is perfect! It goes on smooth and creamy and gives me some hydration as well. This is definitely one of my go-to shades now. I also love that it came with a cute makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! The packaging is super beautiful, and the lipstick itself feels great on my lips. When I first out it on I was so surprised at how creamy and hydrating it felt. I got the shades Slip and Cabo and love them both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just picked up Slip and I love it!!! It goes on smooth, feels moisturizing (not at all sticky) Beautiful packaging! Just ordered L'Avenue and Baby!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! I have both Millennial & Cabo & both are the perfect shade. They are long lasting and keep my lips hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite lipstick! I've never been able to find a formula that doesn't dry out my lips until I tried this one. The shades are perfect as well. Buying every color!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for the perfect nude lipstick and this one is by far the best one I've tried! The color is perfect for everyday wear. The formula is super hydrating as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lipstick. The formula is smooth, balm-like and comfortable. It's not ay all sticky and the color is the perfect nude for me. I put the Taupe lip balm on top, also not sticky. Love them both, separately and together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! To be fair, I love all of my Merit products, I'm kind of a Merit stan. So when I saw they were coming out with a lipstick, I was SOLD. I bought 4 shades: Tiger, Baby, Slip and 1990. I have to say I really like how buildable they are; you could go from a sheer-ish look to a more bold lip with a few more swipes. I'm also a fan of the finish (I don't like matte products and this lipstick is a beautiful satin finish). The smell of this product is very lipstick-y if you catch my drift but its whatever compared to the colour palette, wearability and overall look and feel of the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick feels like a balm when it's on. Millenial is a gorgeous color. It's not as pink as I thought it would be. For me, it's like my lips but better. Plus love the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Classic Pink my favorite lipstick color! Amazing for spring! It's sheer and it's so beautiful! Obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a awesome lipstick! I love it so much color Baby is everything! Love texture and it's very natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very smooth and lightweight lipstick. It barely feels like you have anything on! The color is a nice neutral pink with brown undertones. It's not the longest-lasting, but I prefer lipstick be smooth and creamy rather than a heavy, matte, drying formula that stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So smooth and definitely feels very lightweight! Not the most long-lasting, but I'd rather it be smooth and light than matte, heavy, and long-lasting. Pretty berry-toned red color as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super lightweight, easy on the lips, and the wear is fairly long. Obsessed with this shade, my favorite lipstick for the moment for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super lightweight, easy on the lips, and the wear is fairly long. Obsessed with this shade, my favorite lipstick for the moment for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Baby is that natural, everyday, play it up or down color that looks flattering on all skin tones. You can def wear this w/ no makeup too w/o your face looking unbalanced (iykyk). I realized this is superrrr close to the matte tinted lip balm from Nars in the shade Unrestricted (stunning too) - but the difference is the finish. This lipstick can either go on light or more pigmented but stays looking hydrating which is a big win for me. I've BEEN over the matte lip - hydrated looking lips win everyyyy. single. time. Packaging is fly too.. what a shade, sign me up for the infomercial man I'll sell it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Millennial & Baby as a new customer to this brand. I tend to have dry lips (even with balm under lipsticks) but this lipstick kept my lips more moisturized compared to high end brands. I now consider this a high end brand as the color & quality are amazing. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how buildable and soft the formula is but color wise it's too much berry for me - on the model closest to my complexion I like how it looked which is why i went for it originally. I actually really love this shade as a blush tho so i'll continue to use it that way :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Baby is the perfect neutral pink :) Only giving it 4 stars because I had to add a gloss on top to really love the outcome - i'm generally more of a glossy girl !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: True to its color and claim, this lipstick is lightweight, buildable, and super hydrating on lips! I also loved the packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: New favourite lipstick! The perfect neutral + the packaging is gorgeous and feels so luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is sooooo lovely. I like that it's buildable, as just one swipe is enough for a daily look. I'm sometimes wary of berry shades as I have fair skin and it can lean clownish, but Fashion doesn't do this on me. I think the color looks the same in person as it does in the picture. Surprisingly good as a daily lip color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Millennial is the perfect your lips but better color for me. I was between this one and Baby, but am really glad I went with this as it matches my natural color very well. I think it looks less pink in person, in a flattering way. It also definitely feels lighter than a traditional lipstick, and goes on very smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best every day lipstick I have ever used. It is so sheer and comfortable but you can easily build up the color if you want something more intense. I want to get every shade now but L'Avenue is my perfect every day color for sure. And the packaging is really unique I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the lipstick!!! The millennium color is perfect for everyday use and so far is my favorite. It hydrates your lips and makes the perfect final touch to your look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color matches my natural lips, I felt it enhanced my natural color with a nice coverage. I'll be wearing this color for a fresh casual look, perfect for transitioning into spring. I have sensitive lips and this lipstick did not disappoint my lips remained buttery soft and hydrated, a huge win for me! Love neutral colors like this, they're so easy to wear definitely will be adding the color Slip to my collection soon!

reviews.review_title: Chic color for a night out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wore L'avenue for a winter wedding in LA and it was the perfect color! The berry brown color gave me moody chic look! I was surprised at how long the color lasted even after I ate and drank. This color will easily be my go to for date night, dinner, or a girls night out! The formula is lightweight and easily buildable which I love love!

reviews.review_title: Baby- Beautiful formula but color is off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is beautiful and great but the color is definitely a colder shade of pinku2026 I expected a warmer, rosy shade. Instead, Baby is pale and very light. Did not work for my olive skin tone, so I am returning. However, Tiger worked beautifully with my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't worn a red lip in years, but wanted to try Merit's formulation! Cabo is such a nice warm red that's really flattering and doesn't wash out the rest of my complexion! I also didn't experience color bleeding, which I always worry about with red lipsticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This applies so smoothly, and wears well without drying out your lips! The color Baby is so flattering and doesn't pull too pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and formula, feels amazing on. Would purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color and buildable too!! Feels amazing on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been looking for the perfect deep brown lip and this is it! Couldn't say it enough, but the signature lip collection is so moisturizing & creamy! Can't wait to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this shade, gives your lips a nice boost of color! Packaging is beautiful and love that it doesn't leave my lips feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit products. The mascara is incredible and I own the lip oils in three shades. When Merit announced a lipstick, I placed an order before watching any YouTube reviews. The formula is creamy and looks gorgeous on the lips. My only complaint is that the bullet is quite soft and after one application I could see indents on the actual lipstick. I'm going to keep it but I plan to be very careful when applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a red lip but a little lighter and with a beautiful orange undertone. Beautiful packaging, fantastic quality, and a new essential for my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful nude color that is enough of a difference from my natural lip color for it to take my look to the next level. Super moisturizing that I don't feel the need to add a balm underneath. Also, I've always adored Merit's branding and packaging, and this line did not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for the perfect brown 90's lipstick for a while and I finally found it! I'm completely obsessed. Love how soft and moisturizing it feels too, not drying at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this color and lipstick formula. It's such a sexy, perfect red. Feels very soft and hydrating on the lips too

reviews.review_title: The lipstick doesn't merit a great review.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit products for their ease of use and formulas. I was so excited to try the new lipstick and ordered in the Millennial shade. I liked the pinky hue as advertised. However - the color when I opened it was much more brown and darker. So much so that I had to make sure I ordered the right color and that I was delivered the correct color. It's not super flattering or special. I wish there were more flirty shades - pinks/reds in the line. I also wish they used the same pretty blue packaging on the lipstick. It just falls flat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to select a single colour for this review but I actually purchased Cabo, Fashion, Millenial and Tiger. I purchased them directly from the Merit website but also wanted to review them here. I love of all them. They apply so smoothly and are super buildable. You can pick if you want to go more sheer or bolder. I love the texture, which is very comfortable and light. They are easy to wear throughout the day and will be a daily staple for work. As I said, I love them all but the biggest surprise for me was Tiger. I'm not a big red lipstick person, but I liked that it was subdued and as described, more brick coloured. It's perfect. But I think my absolute favourite has to be Cabo which is that perfect orange colour which is so in this fall and winter, but without being too bright. All 4 of them though, are winners!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most beautiful mix of hydration and pigment that I have ever tried. It has enough coverage to give you a nice easy coat with a couple of swipes, but never leaves your lips feeling crusty or too thick. This color is effortless and will be my everyday shade, which I have been looking for for a very long time! I ordered another in the Fashion color to have one for more fun occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a fun way to add spice to your day!! This color is not only perfect for a summer day but a great fall transition lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most creamy perfect everyday pink lip!!! I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that almost all Merit products are intended to be buildable. Having control over the pigmentation is so valuable to me and I usually don't get that with lipsticks. These are special. I find one swipe is pigmented enough for me but like to do 2-3 swipes for a really moisturized look and feel. These are def soothing on the lips. The colors I've tried so far (Millennial and Fashion) really complement my fair-light skin. I disagree with the reviewer who said Millennial is rosy brown. It's pink on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clings to every dry patch, not sheer, more like medium opacity at first swipe, colors are darker than described. The lip oils are superior in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lipsticks are unique and wonderful. The color options are a great array of muted nudes, the shades are extremely sophisticated, nothing looks cheap. The PACKAGING is exquisite, and the formula? Amazing. I love that they are actually sheer but definitely buildable. I own 5 shades and they are my absolute favorite lipsticks out of everything I own. For more pigment, apply to dry lips, for something more sheer apply over lip balm or oil.

reviews.review_title: Millennial  Pink is Brown, not Pink.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked up the shade millennial pink, which is described as a classic pink. However the shade is not pink at all, but rather more of a rosy brown. I already have a Gucci lipstick in blaze of noon which is exactly the same shade. Disappointed that the shade was not well represented in the promotional materials. The formula is fantastic though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In love with the silky lightweight feeling of this lip. Super hydrating and lasts a long time while feeling like you're wearing nothing at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect shade of neutral. It applies on smoothly and feels silky and velvety on my lips. It leaves my lips feeling hydrated and plump.

reviews.review_title: JUST OKAY, COLORS AREN'T ACCURATE FROM PICTURES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit products especially their lip oil. I was excited when they came out with lipsticks because they make the best lip shades, but what's shown online is not at all accurate. Ordered Slip, Cabo, and Tiger. Slip is a little more on the brown side than a true nude. Cabo is a bright warm red, but too orange that it looks almost clown-ish on me. Tiger is a cool red, not as pigmented as I was expecting but I liked it since they're buildable, but the rest went to waste. I suggest trying out the lipsticks in store as the colors don't really match the pictures online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels so lightweight and luxurious when I apply it onto my lips. I am in love with the color, it really gives you full coverage. I absolutely adored the packaging and the pouch that came as a free gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I forgot to mention in my other review for slip, how much I love the design for these lipsticks, it is very easy to open, and it is just overall a cute aesthetic to have in your purse. Moving forward, the color of Tiger is not bright, it's definitely a brick-red at first after a while it does fade fairly quickly--but, into a beautiful lighter shade of brick red. It is almost as if you took your fingers and smudge it a little bit. My lips also felt very soft after putting it on, I'm so used to putting balm first before I put on lipstick but I skipped that for this because it was not needed. If you want a brighter and more extroverted color, I wouldn't pick this one for you. Personally, I would wear this particular color out for dinner if I want to feel elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a lip color that will compliment your face with no makeup, this is the best choice. It is a more natural color, it's not shiny or sparkly, it reflects a warm lip color with a bit of moisture. I would specifically wear this lip color to work or while grabbing a coffee with a friend. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased baby, fashion.. I love them both! Baby is the perfect pinky nude, and fashion has a bit more drama to it which I love for most occasions. The formula is very lightweight, just as it says. Also, the packaging is beautiful !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lipstick. I've recently tried (and liked!) several of the other clean-beauty lightweight lipsticks on the market (Ilia's Balmy Tint, Kosas Lip Fuel) but wow, Merit's is the TOP. It's a true lipstick. The color is so present and has a nice duration. And the best part is that it's really moisturizing so that as it wears off there isn't any whiskering on more mature lips! Tiger is described as a warm, brick red and it's rosy when you put it on. You know those products that you immediately move from the lipstick area of your cabinet to the everyday make-up area? This is one of those! Truly my new signature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect 90's mauve, with a barely-there berry tint. L'avenue has cooler (rather than warm brown) undertones. The lipstick is so smooth and natural looking, neither matte nor glossy. And, for what it's worth, the packaging is gorgeous: the brass tube is heavy and substantial, and the case is a high-quality tinted lucite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with L'avenue! I feel like this color is perfect for everyday but if you do a full swatch it's a perfect date night color. The formula of the lipstick is one of my favorites. It's lightweight and feels like chapstick honestly. Also the packaging is so lux and sexy. Obsessed with everything MERIT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the Shade Cabo. I think it's a great shade for a little more pinky tone added to your lips. I also really enjoyed the hydrating feel is had. You can make it a sheer wash of color for hydration or apply the full color for a beautiful lip color. I would definitely recommend to my friends!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this red!!!! I don't typically wear lipstick but I received this as a gift and will definitely be wearing this. I love how natural it looks while still having a pop of color. Very easy to apply, reminds me of the Lustre's from MAC.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually wear lipstick but this was so easy to apply and the shade is very natural looking! It made my lips feel moisturized and you can layer for more pigment :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have many berry brown lipsticks and lip gloss in my life. I found this one gives a more elegant vibe. The packaging won't disappoint you at all I promise

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are dry at all time but I found this lipstick pretty hydrating (even with multiple layers). Perfect for last minute touch up before Zoom meeting - just gently apply a little bit on your inner lip and spread the product out. It can be very pigmented if needed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is easily my new favorite lipstick. I've been searching everywhere for a nice, natural, classic pink that is suitable for daily wear and isn't too drying. It isn't too matte, too bright, too dark - it's just right :)

It also smells quite nice and isn't drying; I usually have to pair lipstick with some lip balm, but didn't need to with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Leaves my lips so moisturized, I love! Also love this color u2013 the perfect amount of color/darkness for me without looking too intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. I normally opt for lip liner + a gloss since lipstick dries my lips out but this one does not. So moisturizing and enhances my natural lip color so well without looking over the top!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for us pale folk!  I went out on a limb and tried Cabo full well knowing that I've often struggled to find a good soft orange red that isn't too in your face red or too overtly orange.  I honestly love it.  It's the perfect shade such that it will work great in Summer and Winter.  It's also much more moisturizing with better pigment than other reds that I've tried so I feel like I can wear it all day without worrying about my lips looking like a shriveled raisin or fading.  Super light-weight and silky without any tacky or overly matte finish.  Will definitely be trying more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not typically a lip stick girl (I generally go for a lip conditioner or a balm with a tint) and I have to say this is my new go-to lip shade.  It's super lightweight and silky, moisturizing and great pigment.  I'm fair/light skin with neutral to cool undertones and neutral pink color is perfect for everyday, but also effortless for a night out. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the shade Millenial!  It is the perfect pink lipstick. The formulation is super moisturizing and easy to apply. The color payoff is amazing, yet it feels so lightweight and looks so natural.  Merit never disappoints - I love their cheek products and these lipsticks are just as amazing. It lasts throughout the day and feels so hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail lipstick! I tried the Signature Lip Lightweight Lipstick in the shade Fashion. I love a berry shade for my everyday lip and this shade is so flattering. The formula is truly lightweight; it doesn't feel heavy like a normal lipstick. The application is so smooth and feels very hydrating. The packaging is also beautiful and it feels very luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color so much! Super light weight and flattering for winter makeup looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade translates darker on my lips, compared to the swatches I've seen, and because of that it's not an everyday kind of shade for me. I do like it when I am opting for a bolder neutral lip (a good mix between brown and berry). The formula is hydrating, creamy and lasts for a decent amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not think I would love this shade as much as do, as I thought it would be more of a bolder shade. However, this is a perfect neutral shade that accentuates the lips without looking overdone. A favorite, for sure.

reviews.review_title: Slip: The perfect accessory for any look

reviews.review_text: I was gifted slip and I'm in love! The texture is amazing, it glides right on and it is the perfect neutral shade that gives you just a hint of colour for that model-off-duty effortless make-up look!   It has become a daily staple, I love putting it on to go out and run errands - it makes me feel a little more put together even on those u201cmehu201d days!

Beautiful product, I love the packaging and the shade itself. The formula is very smooth but not super long lasting relatively. Overall, however, I am very happy with the product!
